text:
Awal kami tiba di pantai kami kira sangat menyenangkan melihat pantai yg putih bersih pas depan Scallywag, ternyata itu restorannya, villanya harus kami tempuh dengan berjalan kaki sekitar 15 menit masuk ke dalam permukiman rumah penduduk. Karna kami banyak anak kecil sehingga ketika tiba di villa kita tidak mau keluar lagi mengingat jauhnya perjalanan dan hari sudah sore. Mereka memberikan free 4 unit sepeda tapi karna byk anak kecil tdk bisa kami keluar semua. Akhirnya menghabiskan waktu di villa dengan berenang. Malam kesulitan mencari makan, untung tidak jauh kami menemukan penjual pecel ayam, lumayan utk mengisi perut.
Keesok paginya kami sarapan dengan bersepeda, anak kecil menyewa cidomo krn transportasi hanya sepeda dan cidomo (andong). Pulang pergi dari villa naik cidomo sudah habis 300ribu rupiah. Kalau semua dewasa dan bisa naik sepeda pasti asik, kalau naik cidomo terus bisa tekor hehe..
Breakfast standart Gili yg sy rasa kurang masuk di lidah orang Indonesia, tapi menu lumayan banyak daripada Scallywag hotel yg di Gili Trawangan. 
Villa dengan harga yg murah tapi cukup luas, hanya saja kebersihan dirasa kurang, terutama utk handuknya kurang bersih, agak berbau. Utk kebersihan ranjang masih oke.
Overall oke hanya lokasi yg jauh masuk ke permukiman penduduk bikin sy berpikir ulang utk kembali tinggal disana, mungkin kalau dewasa semua bisa mengendarai sepeda sy rasa bukan masalah utk lokasi yg jauh di dlm.
Utk service jgn ditanya, Scallywag tidak perlu diragukan lagi, semua staff sangat bersahabat dan komunikatif. Kepuasan tamu adalah diatas segalanya, mereka terlihat sangat memperhatikan hal itu. Thanks Scallywag!
title: Villa bagus lokasi kurang bagus

text: We are here twice and enjoyed each visit. Good location and staff were friendly. Had some tapas for lunch which were more than enough (mushrooms on bread in a creamy sauce and fish taco’s)plent of vegetarian options. Would definitely go back
title: Worth a stop

owner_response.text:
Thankyou for the review!

Glad you enjoyed the stop Melanie.

We do hope to see you in the future.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The food was great food cocktails  and the place is a must on gilli air awesome  vibe and good music playing in the back really a gem on the island and worth a meal and a couple of strong cocktails  on the beach . The staff are also  really friendly.
title: Dinner on the beach great food

owner_response.text:
Thanks for the review Dom!

Laid-back beach vibes with good food and drinks, what more do you need?

We hope to see you again.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This hotel is lovely if you want complete privacy. The courtyard to each room is behind a locked door and we would have liked somewhere a bit more sociable.  The room however was beautiful, minibar was very well stocked and bathroom was fantastic.  However, it was at least a five minute cycle to breakfast and the pool was quite shaded.  The hotel was lovely but we would have liked to have been somewhere where we could sit on our patio and people or view watch!  It was extremely luxurious though.
title: Nice hotel but would have liked more sociable hotel.

owner_response.text:
Thankyou for the review Anne!

I do hope you managed to get some prime-time in at the beach-club after breakfast!
People / Views / Sun / Swimming 

We hope to see you again next time.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Staying with Scallywags in a fantastic villa with private pool. Staff are extremely friendly and customer service is first class. Great choice of Scallywags restaurants and also used Scallywag divers. Diving is excellent and turtles were huge. Totally recommend staying here on this relaxed island.
title: Scallywags on Gili Air is heaven

text: Stayed in Gili Air for a week and found this place to eat .. outstanding food and service .. ate here in many occasions as the food was so delicious we need to come back and try other food on the menu and it did not disappoint... if you get a chance definitely eat here ..
title: Wow

text: First time I visited Scallywags beach club was in 2013; and I came back 2016 and booked 2 nights at Scallywags smugglers retreat. Back then I knew that this is the best hotel on Gili Air. No doubt. Electricity is always working because Scallywags has its own generator, it's clean and superbly furnished with a private patio, and the breakfast buffet is to die for. Just amazing. I came back in November and December 2018 and stayed 4 nights and now I am more convinced that the staff makes this place so excellent. They are the most helpful, professional and amazing people working at Scallywags on Gili Air. They deserve all the praise and admiration more than the rooms and the facilities.
title: I keep coming back for a reason

text:
Highly commended! The staff, including Shahin, Asnan and ‘Boy’, were extremely friendly and helpful. We were made to feel like VIPs, nothing was too much trouble. We stayed in one of the Scallywag’s Rumah Dua bungalows and our friends in the other. It was perfect as the two rooms have a small private courtyard that can be locked - this was great for quiet afternoon gatherings and storing the bikes. The bikes are highly recommended for easily getting around the island.
The accommodation is located about a 5 minute bike ride from the Beach Club, where meals, drinks, sun beds, snorkelling, diving etc. are situated. We found this to be ideal as we could return to our rooms for complete solitude. The swimming pool was great too as it is well shaded, making it a refreshing alternative to the beach.
The food was excellent! Breakfast was included in our package and there was enough selection to satisfy everyone. 
There were no real issues with mosquitoes (we did take repellent of course) or the mosque. 
Make sure you go snorkeling or diving to see the turtles, quite amazing.
We look forward to a return visit!
title: Rumah Dua - awesome!

text: The staff at Scallywags were friendly and efficient from moment we arrived. Any queries were quickly answered allowing us to enjoy our time on Gili Air. The two rooms at Rumah Dua were cool, clean and well presented and the perfect solution for two families travelling together. We enjoyed the setting in the village as it gave us contact with locals and their shops, warungs(restaurants) and laundry services. The pool at Smugglers was spotless and a great escape from the warm sun.The bicycles, through Scallywags, were well maintained and reliable, allowing us a explore the island and whilst they didn't have a bike with a baby seat, quickly organised one from a another provider for us. The bike was essential as the walk to breakfast was a little further/warmer than we had expected. A very enjoyable stay in comfortable surroundings.
title: Quiet comfortable setting with efficient staff.

text: There are plenty of plus points, it’s a nice room, the staff are pleasant and helpful, the beach location for breakfast is nice. However, the property is located close to the mosque and the call to prayers is broadcast through a loud and distorted PA system. The morning broadcast starts at around 4.30am! And lasts an hour. It is very difficult to sleep.
title: Sleepless Nights

text:
Our family of 6 stayed in Joglo 2 for 5 nights.
The villa was very private, set in its own garden behind a lockable gate and not overlooked.
We were very pleasantly surprised at how spacious the villa is; 2 decent sized double bedrooms and a twin, each with lovely open air shower rooms. There was a big terrace with sofas and a coffee table, plus a big dining table and decent well appointed kitchen. 
The pool was much more than just a plunge pool as we'd imagined from the photos and there were 6 comfortable sun loungers around it.
The villa is a good 15-20 minute walk from breakfast at the beach club, but they will deliver breakfast to the villa if you order it the night before, or you can take the free bikes and cycle down in 5-10 minutes.
The staff was excellent. They were there at the jetty to meet us when we arrived, which was lucky as we were being hassled by the many horse and cart men to take us to the villa for a rather large fee....They carried all our cases on their bike handlebars to reception then on to the villa, and were superb during our stay.
Breakfast at the beach club was good, a decent buffet plus fresh eggs however you want them.
We had a seafood BBQ on the beach one night and although a bit expensive for Gili it was the best meal we had. The butterfish was probably the best fish I've ever eaten.
I would also highly recommend Scallywags divers. They are a very friendly and competent bunch and there are loads of dive sites close by, most teeming with the biggest green turtles I've ever seen.
There are lots of cheap warungs close by, good massage places, shops and decent restaurants all over the island. 
Overall everything was pretty much perfect and I would thoroughly recommend this place for a family holiday.
title: Wonderful Joglo Villa

text: We were three generations, four adults + two littlies staying in Joglo villa. It was perfect. Gili Air is laid back, traffic free, great for biking and strolling around. Lovely beaches and good range of eateries and bars.  The villa was great and well equipped but most of all the Scallywags team went out of their way to help, from the moment we got off the transfer boat to getting their speedboat back over to Lombok. We stayed a week but longer would have been better. Thank you, Rosie and family.
title: What’s not to like!

owner_response.text:
Hi Rosie,

It was great to hear you had such a fabulous time with us & you & your family enjoyed your time on Gili Air. We have passed your review on to all our team, they so pleased to hear your thoughts. We hope we can accommodate you again in the future.

The team at Scallywags Resort Gili Air
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: It’s pretty basic. The room was lovely, bathroom is outside so bugs etc, but it’s pretty!! The breakfast is a short walk away, down by the beach, it’s a nice setting, food is whatever. Location is good. Staff were very friendly and the pool was small but nice. Overall happy with the stay.
title: Good for the price

text: We had the best time in scallywags. The staff is super friendly, helpful and smiling non stop. The service was really good. Excellent accomidation. Breakfast was fresh and tasty. The room is clean and cozy ! The minute we arrived we got a welcoming beer and ice cold towel for refreshing! For sure we will come back if we’ll be in gili air again.
title: Accomidation

Scallywags Team

text:
We were so happy to have chosen Scallywags. It is tucked away in the middle of the island but close to ferry and mainstreet. Small pool ( that our daughter loved) but clean and refreshing. Nice and clean room with good a/c and comfy bed. Wonderful staff! 
A 10 minutes walk to the beach ehere breakfast is served. Good beachclub with comfy beachbeds free of charge. 
Will definately recommend Scallywags to friends. Good value for money!

text: Stayed here with a friend while traveling - we didn’t think you could get any better than the scallywags in Gili T, but then we came to Gili Air and they were amazing! The staff do everything thy can to make sure your stay is great. The restaurant and beech area is paradise, the food is delicious (especially the bbq). But the staff really do make the hotel, particular Egy who was brilliant and made everything super easy (traveling from island to island etc). Wouldn’t stay anywhere else.
title: Can’t get any better

text:

Firstly You will underestimate for the resort cause its place in dirty alleyways and far from main road, but when you entry to Your room the bad mood would be gone...!!!

They have nice & helpful staff like B’li Bahar & B’li Bayan (thank you...!!!). And Resort Manager Pak Nyoman who arrange our boat to Gili Trawangan.
If you are looking quite and nice place you should try to sleep at here.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Really enjoyed our stay for 2 nights in the joglo with a group of 7 friends. Staff accommodation the extra person and gave us an extra bed in the joglo. Lovely accommodated with great pool.very friendly staff who organised a boat for us to Gili T and snorkelling tour. Great to have bikes to get around the island. Would highly recommend staying here. Lovely food and drinks in the restaurant also. Keep a track of the mini bar as it makes it easier for check out.
title: Great stay in scallwags

text:
Great hotel just minutes from the beach on Gili Air. We stayed for 3 nights and wished we could have stayed longer. Rooms were lovely with an outdoor open air bathroom with a rain shower which was a great feature. The rooms were clean and amenities replenished daily. The bed was a bit hard but that is common throughout Asia. They had a small plunge pool with loungers if you decided against the ocean or needed some time out of the direct sunlight. Our room had a small terrace that was enclosed behind a gate for privacy. It was very nice to be able to sit out there and enjoy it. 

The hotel included breakfast at their beach club which is another awesome feature. You had to walk or bike less than a kilometer to get the breakfast but It is on the best beach on the island for swimming. You get two sun beds and an umbrella for shade included. I love the sun but this was a nice feature as it was hot and shade was necessary part way through the day. 

You could rent bicycles from the hotel as well which was great. We rode around the island in less than an hour and it made the trip back and forth to the beach more enjoyable. The staff were very friendly and knew our names within a day of arrival. I definitely recommend this hotel. We were sad to leave.
title: Fantastic boutique hotel on Gili Air

text:
I stayed in their single rooms for 7 nights. The rooms are basic but have everything I needed. The bathrooms are communal but clean. There is air conditioning in the rooms. 

It is about a 10-12 min walk to the beach club for breakfast. You did get a sun chair at their beach club. The front row is reserved for scallywag customers. The breakfast is buffet and pretty good. The lunch/dinner menu is good but a bit pricey. 

You can hear the noise from the mosque but it didn't really disrupt me once I was in my room. 

I also highly recommend checking out their dive Center, scallywag divers located right next to the beach club.
title: Single room

text:
With a group of four we got a table directly at the beach with most beautiful atmosphere. The menu was surprisingly creative and offered lots of different high quality variations. 
I went for the tuna sashimi as a starter, followed by the grilled butter fish and banana tempura for dessert. Everything was really tasty. 
For Indonesien standards the service was quite good as well. 
All in all a fantastic dinner at the beach...!!
title: Awesome Dinner directly at Beach

text: Not quite cheap, but then again Gili Air is quite expensive anyway. Rooms are modern and nicely furnished, staff at smugglers is very attentive and helpful, breakfast at Scallywags Beach Club veeeery good! Would go again.
title: Great place to stay

text:
We stayed in one of the Joglo villas of Scallywags in August, for 3 nights.
It was clean, the beds were very good, the mini bar was fully stocked, and it came with three free bikes which is ideal for Gili Air. 
The staff was very helpful, we got a small mobile phone so we could always call the reception when we needed something or had a question. 

Would definitely stay here again.
title: Scallywags Joglo villa

text:
We absolutely loved our stay here! The staff was very welcoming and helping with everything from the first minute on. The room and outside bathroom was beautifully designed and equipped with everything that you want (even a fridge!). While there were power outs on the whole island, our aircon, tv and good wifi worked still. The location is hard to find at first but only a 5 minute walk to the pier and 15 minutes to the beach club where you get a beach bed and towel for free. Also a plus was the breakfast buffet and the beach club that allowed us to grab something before our dives at 8AM and was delicious with everything from eggs to real bread to pancakes and muesli. 

The only small downside we found was that all the guests would reserve a sun chair at 10 AM and not turn up till much later, so when we wanted one at 12 we had to wait an hour where as only 2/3 of the chairs were actually being used. If we can suggest a way to improve this, we'd say that you shouldn't be able to reserve a chair for the whole day at all but just get one as long as you're actually there. 

Apart from this minor detail we enjoyed our time at Scallywags Hideaway and Gili Air completely and can only recommend staying there if you're looking for a small, homely boutique accommodation!
title: Amazing homely gem in paradise

text:
I recent stayed at Scallywags in a single room. This is the first time I've done the whole "backpacker room" thing but I was pleasantly surprised. The room is small but cute with the comfiest bed I've had so far in Indonesia (including expensive resorts). There are 5 rooms and 2 toilets and 2 showers to share. They were clean albeit one of the showers had a horrible smell. I never had to wait to use anything and the other girls staying at the same time were very clean. 

Scallywags is easy to reach from the harbour and they had someone waiting for me when I left the boat to take my bag (I booked my transfer from Bali through them).

The restaurant/beach club is just a 10 minute slow stroll along the beach and does a wonderful western breakfast buffet included in your room price. You can also reserve a beach bed for free. Reserve one at breakfast to save your favourite spot. The dinner bbq was wonderful too albeit service is extremely slow for drinks etc.

The staff is wonderful. I like the fact that tips are equally shared between them.

Totally recommended and a great first time shared experience. I could've easily stayed longer than my 2 booked nights.
title: Single Room

text:
Me and my boyfriend stayed in Scallywags Hideaway Resort at Gili Air for 7 nights. The arrival was very pleasant, you get a cold towel and a welcome drink. The staff is very kind, interested in their guests and always willing to help you or have a conversation with you. You really feel 'special'.

The room was very modern, cosy and clean (cleaned every day), and when we arrived, the room was made even more cosy with lights, it was perfect. The bed was perfect, we slept very well. Also there is a good working AC, TV, DVD player with loads of DVD's at the reception, a huge filled fridge and other standard room equipment. The (outdoor) rainshower is very big and comfortable. It is providing hot and cold water. When we walked out of the room, we entered our own private cute terrace. When you open the doors you will enter the 'hall' with a beautiful pool and another bathroom which is also very clean and for everyone to use.

The breakfast was 15 mins walking from the hotel, but it is worth it. You can get everything you wish for. Different kind of (fresh) juices, smoothies, milkshakes, coffee, tea, cappuccino, soft drinks, etc. The food includes: different types of eggs, different types of pancakes, fresh fruit, Indonesian food, cereals and granola with yoghurt, toasted bread and other warm dishes.

The sunbeds at the beach in front of ScallyWags restaurant are included in the price and they are reserved for you until 10. Also bikes were included in the price because we have booked through the Scallywags' website. The Scallywags divecenter which is located next to the Scallywags restaurant is the best we've ever dived with. Everything is done for you and you only have to focus on your actual dive. Very relaxed, good planning, nice staff and perfect equipment included. Only one girl (the one with curly hair) wasn't very motivated in our opinion... as well as with paying as with telling us about the dive planning... 

A few improvement points for Scallywags could be: the WI-FI login which you have to go throught everytime you have locked your phone, it is very annoying. And also there could be served some more platter for the toast at breakfast (like ham/cheese/salami/etc.)

All in all, Koen and Gwen would really like to thank all the ScallyWags staff for providing us the best service! Thanks.
title: Hidden paradise at Gili Air

text: We were in Bali but decided to go to Gili Air for a few days and boy were we glad we did. We stayed in a Scallywags villa which was fantastic and ate at the Scallywags bar. Great food, terrific staff. It's a long trip from the UK but we'll definitely go back. It was that good. Totally recommended.
title: Love Scallywags

text:
We stayed in a beautiful 6 bed villa with a private pool that wowed our expectations!
Pure luxury, style and sophistication. Set in a very quiet street , it was so relaxing.  I have travelled a lot with my work in the travel business and I put this at the top of my favourites..Definitely will be returning, the only difference is that it will be for longer. Staff were amazing. Food was amazing.. Fantastic service.
title: Luxury on a Paradise Island

owner_response.text:
Hi Sue
Thanks so much for your wonderful review of our Joglo Style Smugglers Villa.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit.

Regards
Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Overall a fantastic experience!

The hotel was one of the best on the island with friendly staff, great rooms and thoughtful extra touches, such as drinks vouchers, free sunbeds at the beach club, free use of bikes during the stay and good recommendations for things to do on the island. 

Only downside would be that our towels were quite badly stained and we asked for them to be changed without seeing any action taken. 

Also, if you don't want to be a 10 minute walk away from breakfast, this may not be for you. But trust me, the breakfast is well worth the wait!
title: Great place to stay on Gili Air

text:
Excellent place,  good value for money,  lovely staff who were very helpful when asked anything. 

I would stay here again without hesitation. 

Breakfast was very good,  a pleasant ten minute walk in the scallywags bar by the beach.
title: Excellent staff

text:
The rooms in this hotel was all around amazing. For 750k I got a huge clean room with a private terrace, a beautiful bathroom, a mini bar and included two free bottles of water. 

It was really hidden in the middle of Gili A, and was nice and quiet. The pool was amazing, but nor really an alternative to sunbath. 

The staff were amazing and helped you in any way they could, and offered bike rent that I got for free. Just all around a really nice experience, definitely recommended if it fits your budget!
title: Amazing rooms, great staff

owner_response.text:

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed here last month after travelling Bali and the Islands, We found it to be one of the best places we stayed on our trip, lovely rooms, very friendly and helpful staff. Do yourself a favour and spend some time here you won't be disappointed!
title: One of the Best on Gili Air

text:
Everything about the hotel is perfect! The rooms are very clean, nice size, very thoughtful arrangements for convenience and the best staff.

The breakfast and the food in the restaurant are not to be missed. Love the Green Juice, Tuna Tataki, Rib eye steak, etc etc... everything in the resto. is nothing short of perfect. We spent 5 nights and definitely coming back soon. The service from the staff is always prompt and proper. They even go a long way to help to accomodate our super early check out. I forgot to take note his name, but one of the staff, ride the bicycle while carrying our 45kg luggage on the bicycle..we would really like to thank him..

Keep up the great team, Scallywags!! We are coming back!
title: Scallywags....5star in Gili Air

text: Spent 2 days at Scallywags Smugglers resort on Gili Air. Lovely room set within a real village atmosphere. Loved the island and the Scallywags beach club and restaurant was particularly good. Could easily have had more time on the island. Loved the use of the bikes and our ride around the island was great. Only downside- this resort is right near the mosque which meant during Ramadan that the calls to prayer and reading of the Koran over loud speaker started at 4.30am and went until 10pm. Not sure if it would be different at other times of the year.
title: Nice resort

text: We walked from the pier to the hotel and it wasn't far, however wheeling our suitcases was preferable to using the horse and cart for us. We were upgraded at check in which was nice of the smugglers. Spacious room with small private garden and compact outside bathroom. The bathroom is a bit dark at night, but after one of our lights wasn't working they changed this for us. Towels and sheets clean, however one day I had a hole in mine and they show signs of stains - hopefully they get some new ones soon, plus you do have to ask for things to be changed. Polite and friendly staff and free welcome drink. They do have bikes which are free but they are limited and go by 7am. Breakfast is at the smugglers beach, just a short walk and you can use the beach towels and sun beds there afterwards. Buffet breakfast with eggs and pancakes to order. Considering the budget for this room, it's fine and pretty central and has a pool. Only other thing to note is the mosque, they have speakers and so it can be heard from your room. Not a major problem other than it waking us up about 3am one night.
title: Value for money

owner_response.text:
Hi m w,

Thanks for your detailed report for us to learn of your experience & for future Scallywags travellers. We will definitely look in to our linen, that's very unusual I must say. The Smugglers team enjoyed looking after you & we hope to see you again.

Thanks,

Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We had a 1night visit to the Gili Air booked while in Bali. We found Scallywags on booking.com thinking the pictures looked nice. We LOVED IT here. The rooms are designed so well, with an 'outdoor' bathroom. The staff were amazing and felt like friends straight away. Scallywags offer sun loungers right on the beach front with their own restaurant a short walk away from the accommodation. We loved Gili's and Scallywags so much we scrapped our plans and went over to Trawangan and also stayed at the Scallywags there.
title: Look no further than Scallywags!

text: Good location, quiet and relaxing. Had 6 of us (3 couples) and the communal area was great. Bit of a walk (short cycle) to the beach but we didn't mind. Lovely clean, cool rooms and nice showers. Would have liked to stay longer.
title: Lovely Villa

owner_response.text:

regards
Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed at smugglers haven, which is in the backstreets about 10 mins walk from the beach club, we hired bikes every day which literally took us about 2 mins to get back and forth, the room is fantastic, air conned...i liked the fact we had our own little area, nice to come back after food, chill outside and have a beer outside. Fully stocked mini bar which is reasonably priced, compared to the bars on gili air. Beach club was awsome, nice and quiet, loads of sun loungers for people who were staying there and The staff were fantastic also, couldn't do enough for you. If I come back I would definitely stay here again. Nice little pool area which we never we used. All in all a 5 *****
title: Awsome place

owner_response.text:
Hi there Nathan
Thanks so much for your kind words, we are super happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us and gave us a 5 star review!

We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit.

Regards
Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Seriously do yourself a favour and book yourself into Smugglers if you visit Gilli Air - you will not be disappointed.
The staff at reception were friendly and efficient and showed me to my room which was spacious, clean, lovely and cool and just so inviting. The outside bathroom was so pretty and organised. The prints hanging in the room a lovely touch and the furniture quintessentially Balinese.
The mini bar was well stocked and to my surprise no government tax on any items so everything was reasonably priced. The pool area was a good size and definitely accommodates those who stay, and it has a rock water feature which is tranquil and very much in the Bali style.  I really could not have asked for more.
I was so enchanted with this hideaway and I can't wait to visit again.
title: Scallywags Smugglers - Loved my room!

owner_response.text:
Hi YvaD
Thanks so much for the kind words and lovely review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and have passed on your feedback to our staff.

We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the Gili Islands.

Thanks again

regards
Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Lovely staff, great rooms with outdoor ensuite (totally concealed with a skylight). Pool wasn't massive but a nice feature, although it was never busy and semi-sheltered, which was a nice change from the big, open beach. Beds were very comfy, rooms were very clean and the dining was all accommodated a short stroll away at their beachfront restaurant. A nice place to spend breakfast where the staff will gladly help you with suggestions on things to do and will also book day and boat tours for you. We did our own private boat which was definitely worth it. Perks include free pushbikes and sunloungers out by the restaurant. The evening BBQ is a must!
title: Clean and cosy hideaway with the best food on the island

owner_response.text:
Hi Emma
Thanks for taking the time to write such a glowing review.  we are happy to hear you enjoyed everything about your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Gili Islands.

Regards

Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Firstly I would like to say that the whole Scallywags operation on the Island is second to none, great service, great value and above all very comfortable. If you need anything, all you have to do is ask.

As you can see by my pictures, this is really well set up, for comfort and for value. You have to walk down, 5 minutes, to Scallywags Beach to have you breakfast, thats lovely in its self as to see the island in early morning motion.

All in all a great place and highly recommended and I must mention Hendrawan, for his great chats and his very positive outlook, we looked forward to seeing him in the morning.

Thanks everyone, brilliant!
title: Wonderful service.

text: We stayed 3 nights at Smugglers and had a wonderful experience.  The staff was EXCEPTIONALLY helpful and kind, at the Hideaway, Beach Club, and Diving.  They even went out of their way to get our bags from the hotel and take them to the marina, in a downpour.  We are a family of 4 and added an extra bed, which worked fine.  Very helpful with the kids as well, including while my wife and I went diving.  The Beach club is a bit of walk for breakfast, but worth it and a great place to kill some time relaxing, snorkeling, etc.  Highly recommended.
title: Excellent all-around experience: food, staff, diving, beach club

text: We stayed here for 5 nights and we couldn't fault the place. It was pretty central to everything, rooms were spotless and staff were fantastic. The mini bar was fully stocked with about 20 different drinks and plenty food, all priced the same you would buy them at the mini mart.  For breakfast you do have to take a short bike ride down to the scallywags restaurant on the water, but we didn't mind. It got us out and about from the moment we woke up. The food was also great :)
title: This place is awesome!

text:
We stayed at Scallywags Smugglers for four days, and we couldn't have asked for anything more.

The staff was very helpful in recommending local food places to eat at, arranging our transport to and from lombok, accommodating our ad-hoc requests and making sure that everything was done at our convenience.

Everyone was also genuinely friendly and it really made a world of difference to our trip. Would recommend Scallywags Smugglers if you're looking for a value-for-money hotel with a great experience!

Thanks to Ripai and everyone at Scallywags Smugglers, and also to Anam and staff at Scallywags Beach Club! 

P.S: If you're looking to do some diving while at Gili Air, Scallywag Divers (right next to the Beach Club) is a great dive shop to check out. New, safe, and they go out in small groups, which really makes a world of difference.
title: Great stay, lovely staff, excellent value

text:
The first room I was given had an odd smell in the bathroom - I mentioned this to the staff who promptly moved me to a different room that was fine.

The room was nice and tidy and I was very comfortable during my stay.
title: Helpful staff, great value

text:
Some friends and I decided to get a Villa while we were in Gili Air and boy was it the best decision we made!! Ever thing was top notch and pretty much a steal for the deal we got! Only downside is I wish we were here for a week!

So here are he pro's and cons to help you decide if this place is for you.

PROS:
-Great decor and nice open layout for the living area and kitchen!
- Bathrooms (FYI: partially outdoors) was gorgeous! I didn't mind that it was partially outdoors. I know some aren't too keen on it so this may be a con for you but trust me it's so nice showering there! All very modern rain shower head. 
-The Villa does come with some mosquito repellers that you light up - definitely helpful for the outdoor bathroom situation but honestly mosquito situation wasn't that bad however they did just do a bug spray down that same day.
-Villa provides bikes for free - much needed to get around the island. The Villa is kind of off the main road but wasn't a problem since we had bikes.
-Comes with a 5-gallon Filtered Water jug plus 2 bottles of water in each room! 

CONS:
-The mosque singing that happens almost every hour until night starting at the crack of dawn! Some may say this is a deal breaker - I didn't wake up from it but I usually leave a TV on as white noise at night spit probably drowned out the singing for me in the morning. Friends of mine in the other room did wake up early from it. The singing didn't bother me during the day either as we pretty much played our own music when we were hanging outdoors.

@Scallywags - highly suggest you warn your guests about this ahead of time and provide some ear plugs for the guests in those villas - I think this is very much needed.

-The location of the Villa is a bit inconvenient but I think all the amenities the Villa has to offer makes up for it.

If you want a taste of luxury and relaxation this Villa is a great start!

FYI - The Scallywags restaurant is delish! Wasn't disappointed by any meal I had while I was there and I ate there 3 times!
title: 3-BR Joglo 2 Villa = 5 stars!

text:
The hotel and staff here are super nice. The grounds are nice as well. They have a chill pool and chairs area, but we didn't use it. 
They are part of Scallywags beach club, which is about a 6 minute walk to the beach for breakfast. They have a BBQ dinner that is also really really good and a decent value too. 
On our arrival the staff picked us up at the pier - helpful when their hotel is a bit confusing to get to when you first arrive. It's a good location though. 

1 star deduction due to the showers being outdoors. My girlfriend was a bit more than shocked by this at first, as they pictures and description doesn't show or say anything about this. There are mosquitos so outdoor shower in the evening can lead to surprise welts later on if you're not careful. 
Overall we had a great time.
title: Good hotel - outdoor shower was a surprise

text:
This felt like a little restful paradise tucked away in the middle of busy Gili Air. The rooms and bathrooms were kept very clean throughout our stay. The beach club had a great selection or food and drinks. My favorite thing about this place is that the mini bar had the same prices as buying food and drinks at the restaurant! That made having a beer while changing clothes guilt free. 

We went during New years and the island was packed. If you would like to use the lounge chairs by the beach (they are nice!) get there early in the morning (before 10 am) otherwise you will be out of luck. 

The staff was kind but inconsistent. We waited a long time for service sometimes. We also originally booked Mangos, but when once we went there, lugging our luggage from the boat drop off, it turned out it was full. We ended up having to carry our luggage to Smugglers Hideaway which wasn't too fun but not a huge deal. 

The location is in the middle of a labyrinth of little alley, tightly packed in with other hotels and hostels. It was about a 10 minute walk to the beach club.
title: Great Stay!

text: Staying at one of their Joglo Villas just now and they are amazing! In low season (february) they come at a price that is almost to good. Listen backpackers: 3 bedrooms with beds for 6 persons, kitchen, livingroom, private pool, bicycles and everything you need for the same rate per person per night as the cheaper rooms on Gili Air. Do not miss out... I am staying with my wife and two kids after escaping from a place with bed bugs. We are all amazed by the place and the staff working here. The service is probarly the best I have ever experienced.
title: Perfect!

text:
First let me say that the room is lovely, bright and spacious. The bedding the softest I've had in asia and the shower is better than mine at home.

But really, how can I not recommend this place enough for their staff. When there was a power cut on the island they went above and beyond to make sure there was minimal to no ineruption to our stay. When I passingly mentioned I had a craving for pineapple at 10pm they delivered some to my door. When I was subsequently food poisoned by a nearby restaurant they couldn't be more helpful or considerate.

Thanks for everything!
title: Bahar, Tufik and staff - Service above and beyond

text: The staff were lovely and always available to help and answer any questions. The food at the scallywags restaurant was pretty good, and right on the beach with a beautiful view. The breakfast buffet was well worth it. The accomodation itself was beautiful, with an outdoor shower and bathroom. We felt very safe here. The pool was small and very refreshing. Thanks for a lovely stay :)
title: Fantastic stay!

text:
All of the amenities of this hotel are nice even on western standards. Very clean/comfortable/quiet room with a clean shower with tons of hot water with a very nicely stocked mini bar (had everything from 3 types of bottled wine/beer/snack/mosquito spray).  I spent New Years Eve here and it was still a very relaxing and private hotel to come back to after night out.

The front desk staff is extremely helpful. I scheduled my trip back to Lombok with them and they got me a better rate than the hotel was offering. 

The only negative is that they hotel is a bit far from the beach and the hotels restaurant. You can rent a bike next door at Aladdin's homestay and ride over to the Scallywags Smugglers Restaurant and beach. It is about a 5 minute bike ride. You can take alley ways all the way there to speed up your trip without going on the mainroads. 

Breakfast is good, tons of options and the highlight is you get a front row chair complimentary at the beach for staying at Scallywags!
title: Very Nice Hotel - Location could be better

text: Lovely hotel with full amenities, tv, ac, mini bar, hot showers. Wifi was painful however as it kept dropping out and username/password required over and over. While location is close to beach and harbour, it is at least a 10min walk to the actually scallywags restaurant.
title: Nice place to stay- location not so much

text: Scallywag Smugglers was just what I wanted: it's a few blocks from the main eastern/southern strip and beach, and nestled near family homes and shacks. The room and common area were super luxury for a really cheap price. The open air shower with extremely hot water was an excellent touch. Staff always greeted me with a smile and went above and beyond to make me feel at home. I'd definitely recommend for solo travelers like myself.
title: Perfect place for a getaway

text:
We stayed at Scallywags Smugglers for a couple of days and it was amazing. The room is great, clean, hot water and ac. The breakfast buffet is also very nice.          

The hotel promises free bikes, it was a struggle to get these however. The bikes seem to be in use by other guests, and when they checked out they where broken or something. They said we could rent them for 50 somewhere else! Thats my main reason for giving 4points instead of 5. (I would give 4,5 if i could haha)

Tedy and the girl at the reception where also of great help. They speak very well English and helped us extend our stay on Gili Air.
title: Superb stay

text:
We stayed in Villa Joglo, run by Scallywags Smugglers. An adorable villa with open air kitchen, dining and living room, with comfortable bedrooms which have air conditioning. Tastefully decorated and peaceful, away from the noisy bars on the beach. Bathrooms are pretty. Kitchen is well equipped if you prefer staying in a cook. Having a bicycle (lent by Scallywags) was very helpful, since the walk to the beach and breakfast is about 15 minutes (to note : if you have young children, Scallywags can help you rent bicycle from shop next door ; child can sit at the back of the bike). The staff responded immediately to my various emails and was very helpful to arrange the travel details (airport pick up with a safe driver, boat which takes you directly to the Scallywags beach club). The food at the Beach Club is very, very good : my husband says the best place to eat in Gili Air. 

Our biggest regret was that we stayed only for 2 nights : so we need to go back and stay longer this time. Will probably book PADI diving course with Scallywags Diving Centre.

I took a cooking class near the jetty : I really recommend it.
title: Wonderful villa for our family

text: Awesome, wonderful, amazing....... love this little hideaway not far from restaurants and many other things the rooms are great clean, I should say very clean. Fully stocked mini bar this is my 2 no stay with scallywags here and the motel both are very clean and nice
title: Staying here now

text: stayed at the singles/ divers room at a discounted price for 3 months. satellite TV, cozy room with an aircon that cools up the room in afew mins, clean room/bathroom and showers as it is washed everyday. friendly staff too! would recommend!
title: Awesome!

text: Stayed for one night only but it was fantastic! Supplied with free bikes to get around, the restaurant although 5 minute ride away was lovely and at both the staff were fantastic. Would stay again, hopefully soon!
title: Great place to stay!

text:
The room was spacious, very clean and had a super comfortable bed.
We had a small private patio in front of our room, the bathroom was outside, which we loved. We had no ants, bugs, mosquito or other insects in our room during our whole stay of 4 nights which was perfect and not the case in any other accommodation we had during our trip. Staff is nice and helpful. For breakfast you will have to walk approx. 10 min or 5 min by bike to the Scallywags Beach Club. There, you have a big breakfast buffet with a good selection. Furthermore, you can get a sunbed with towels for free and enjoy the day on the beach. We can highly recommend this place!!
title: Comfy, very clean and very quiet (aside from the prayer calls from the muezzin)

text:
We stayed there for a night. We both are very happy to the room and service. 

It's few minutes walk from harbor. Good spot. 

Room is very modern and clean. Hotel is very safe. They offer free bike which in very good condition. 

Recommend
title: Recommend

owner_response.text:
Hi Nzcysi,

Thanks for letting us know your feelings about us at Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway

Scallywags Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My and my boyfriend didn't book and walked it. We just wanted to stay 3 days and ended up staying 7 days. Breakfast (buffet) is being served at the Scallywags beachclub, the walk is about 10 min. Absolutely loved this hotel and beachclub. Very friendly and professional staff. When you book we advise to use the Scallywags boat service. 
Looking forward to go back to this place again!
title: Great staff and lovely place

owner_response.text:
Hi Wendy G,

We are looking forward to seeing you again too, come back soon

Thanks,

Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Scallwags Smugglers is a short walk from the harbour. 
The room was very clean and quiet with an amazing open air shower. The airconditioning was very effective . The bed was very hard but as we were only there for one night it was ok - any longer may have been a problem as I have a leg injury 
The breakfast area is a good 10 minute walk from the hotel but the food was delicious and plentiful
title: great place to stay

owner_response.text:
H Gary C,

Thanks for your 5 star review

Smugglers Hideaway Scallywags Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We loved Scallywags! They had wonderful service. They met us at the harbor and helped us carry our luggage. The hideaway is tucked just 5 minutes from the harbor and main road. The rooms are clean and modern. Great showers. The best part is the bikes included that let you freely roam the island. We will definitely come back!
title: Great hotel!

owner_response.text:
Hi deeanne,

Thanks for taking the time to review us, we definitely want to see you again.

Cheers,

Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We moved to scallywags smugglers from a beachside hut airbnb after two days when we found we needed more amenities, such as better AC and a covered toilet facilities (rainy season!). Smugglers turned out to be so much more. We were delighted.

Huge, comfortable bed and bedding, lovely powerful AC, fridge and stocked minibar with same as outside prices, and despite being inland, it is well placed for restaurants (Ruby's, Sharkbites, Bread, etc nearby) and reaching the main beach area.

They also offer FREE bike rentals (reserve night before) which made the whole island easily accessible. Also an affordable laundry next-day service is located right across the alley. 

Breakfast is included and while it's not on site (it's at the beach bar/restaurant) it's only 5min away by bike and VERY good. Huge hot and cold options to suit euro, local, and American tastes, with delicious made to order banana or pineapple pancakes.

The entire staff could not have been more helpful or polite, they even hand-carries our luggage down to the pier for us when we checked out. Absolutely recommend Scallywags!!
title: Modern luxuries on otherwise remote island

owner_response.text:
Hi there  Leah B,

Thanks for such a glowing review, we have let all the staff know, thanks again

Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Everything was close to perfection. The only minus would be the location (far from beach club and close to dark alleys). The room is relaxing, and the AC and hot water are reliable (something rare on the island).
The breakfast is the highlight of the day!
title: Just perfect!

owner_response.text:
Hi Mary C,

We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, thanks for the review & 5 stars

Scallywags Management n
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I had a great stay at Scallywags. Couldn't really fault a thing. 
A free complimentary drink of your choice on arrival! A great buffet breakfast included, free bike rental (loved the bike ride to breakfast in the morning) and a comfortable sunbed at the beach! 
The room was immaculate and beautifully designed. I felt right at home and didn't want to leave.
The staff are so warm, friendly and helpful. I'd recommend to anyone to stay here, you wont regret it.
title: One of the best!

owner_response.text:
Hi Barry R,

Thanks for you recommendations

The team at Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The room was beautiful and spacious, great breakfast buffet at their restaurant which is only a short walk from the hotel. Fully stocked mini bar at reasonable prices and friendly, helpful staff  would love to go back!
title: Great all round

text:
My partner & I arrived on the island unfortuntley our first two nights we stayed at another accommodation which almost had us leaving the island, If it wasn't for us having dinner at scallywags beachfront, the wonderfull staff + amazing food hehe our experience would have been very different. Next day we went back asked about rooms explained what happen within 10min they had us a room for our last two nights on gili air! 
Staff were absolutely outstanding! Everything! We are so very grateful, I have to say there was one staff memeber ( Hendrawan ) who was full of laughs, information seriously deserves a gold medal so much love for him! Cant wait to visit again. Thank you Scallywags for making our stay on gili air.
title: Amazing! Beyond Amazing!!!

text: We stayed for five days for our honeymoon and really loved our stay. The room was great and felt really homely with our own little court yard space to chill in the evening. A great location to enjoy the island. I found the staff to be very friendly and helpful. The mini bar selection was brilliant with a fab breakfast selection at the beach club. We also loved the scallywags bikes to explore. Would highly recommend to anyone.
title: Great place

text:
Stayed in the single room for three nights after a terrible experience at another establishment on the island. 

Man called Herman was fantastic - sorted me out with a room in the middle of a busy dinner service. 

The room itself was wonderful. Comfy, cosy bed. Absolutely immaculate with plenty of storage, good lighting, excellent AC and a TV.

The shared bathroom and toilet facilities were also immaculately and I saw them being cleaned multiple times during my stay. Hot water was a nice bonus in the shower!

Breakfast was brilliant - pancakes are so light and fluffy! Staff in the restaurant are very friendly and such a bonus to have access to the beach loungers too. 

Would 100% recommend and return.
title: Single room

text: We had a wonderful stay here. The room was clean and cozy and the staff was fantastic. We loved the connivence of being able to rent their bicycles and visit their beach club. The food was great. We loved Gili Air. It's a good mix of quiet, romantic nightlife and bustling during the day. We cannot thank Teddy and Sunpardi enough for their above and beyond service. My husband and I needed medical care when we were visiting and they helped us find a doctor and even went with us to the clinic to translate. We will be back and highly recommend this to anyone traveling here.
title: Best service and Lovely Accommodation

text:
Overall, this is a nice, clean boutique hotel that offers good value.  Although it is not located on the beach, it is only a 5-10 minute walk to the harbor, and it is really easy to rent a bike to get around.  Rooms are clean and functional, and wi-fi is good and reliable.  Management is friendly and helpful.  There is a shared swimming pool in the courtyard although we did not have time to use it.  Like most hotels on Gili Air, this is a small, intimate property.  It is quiet and laid back.

Breakfast is good - served at Scallywags Restaurant which is a short bike ride or about a 15 minute walk along the harbor.  

There are several Scallywags properties on Gili Air.  The most well-known are the restaurant, beach club and dive shop that are located in the opposite direction from the harbor than this hotel.  If you know where to go, it is fast and easy to there.  If not, it can be challenging.  If you arrive on a fast boat, trom the harbor, make a left hand turn, go toward the fast boat ticket offices and look for the signs on the signposts.  Beware that if you ask someone how to get to Scallywags, they will probably point you toward the restaurant which is not where you want to check in, and it is a long walk with baggage in tow.

We definitely recommend this hotel and will go back next time we are in Gili Air.
title: Nice Clean Room - Good Value

text: There are a couple of Scallywags resorts on the island and whilst this is tucked away it is easy to find when you arrive on the boat. It is quite hot in the back lanes of Gili Air so this place was a welcome retreat and even though we had a basic room it was cool and a nice space to chill. Breakfast is served at the Scallywags restaurant on the beach and was excellent fare. Even though you had to walk from your hotel to the beach it worked well. Only stayed one night but could have made this our base for our stay on this favoured island of the Gilis
title: Clean and cool

text:
The facilities are more than adequate. There are beach clubs and diving center. 
However, we had a mishap as our daughter fell from the bike we rent from scallywags. They should've check it before renting it out to customer.
title: Long weekend

text:
We spent 4 nights in the three bed villa which were absolutely excellent. 

PROs
- Superb value for money
- Modern furnishings
- Nice little pool
- Excellent beds and bedrooms - with powerful A/C
- Spotless semi outdoor bathrooms - although hot water was hit or miss (comes with the territory I guess)
- Good-ish WIFI and TV channel selection 
- Good cheap mini bar, they bring you cold water bottles every morning
- Friendly staff always keen to help out
- Good little restaurants and cafes nearby 

CONs
- Its probably a 15/20 minute walk from their beach club, but they provide bikes which are 
kind of a necessity I think. So if you want to get to breakfast be aware of that, didn't really bother us that much.
- Pool doesn't get a huge amount of sun due to the big tree looming over it - but we spent most of the days out and about.

All in all would definitely visit again, at that price point its luxury for less!
title: Excellent Three Bed Villa

text:
Stayed here for 4 nights in July. Very cozy place, I was a bit conserned beforehand, but no worries. 5 minute walk from the harbor, we had a deluxe room. Room had a window to the terrace, nice outdoor bathroom. Rooms were quite small, but enough room for two big bags. Very clean and outdoor bathroom was very modern. remember to take earplugs since the prayers start in the morning, if you are not willing to listen that 

we rented bikes, and it was very nice to ride to the beach club for breakfast. also took couple of minutes. Also biking around and to see sunsets was nice. Not worth biking aroun the island, since it's very difficult in some places. Maybe easier to go one way one eay and the other way the other day. 

Breakfast at the club veru good, also dinner. 
They make a reservation for sunbed for you, if you go diving in the morning. They had a brand new dive shop as well. All the equipment looked very new. 

Very nice place after my conserns in the beginning.

50 minutes from the hotel, very good pizzaplace!

Wifi worked occasionally.
title: Very cozy hotel in the center of the island, take a bike for the beach bar.

text:
Just a short 5min walk from the harbor (you don't need the horse cart to get here , we managed easily with our luggage, this property is very cosy and service was great. Any requests or issues were always solved promptly. Special mention to Tedy who was always very obliging and patient with our questions! No problem was ever too big for them. Breakfast was good, buffet style with an egg and pancake station. Mini bar prices were also reasonable (a rarity these days). Wifi and aircon worked well. There's a safe in the room too.

No surprise this place is booked out early so plan ahead!
title: Fantastic Service

text:
Perfect place to spend a relaxing hour after the beaches!

a bit deep among the villagers make you feels just like at your home with trully asian taste of life.
staff were all great, nice food, well managed.

just perfect!
title: A place to call home

text:
Our room was located just off the main smugglers complex which is a 10 minute walk off the coast. Despite a few issues with hot water and water pressure we had a lovely stay at scallywags.
The main asset is access to the beach restaurant and club which has a lovely part of the beach and is great for laying around on the sun lounges most of the day. There's easy access to snorkeling further north along the beach with corals and turtles.
title: Beach Chillout.

text: Me and my partner had a fantastic stay at Scallywags. The management and staff were very friendly and accommodating. The rooms were clean and very comfortable to stay in. Would recommend to anyone looking for a more 'exclusive' stay in Gili Air.
title: Great rooms, friendly staff

text: This was a beautiful villa and I would recommend it in every way.  You feel like you are in a complete hideaway in the middle of bustling streets.  The garden is glorious, there is a wonderful plunge pool and the house is fantastic.  It reminded us a bit of Elle Decor.  Very elegant but cool furnishing/decorations.  Great bikes are right at the property and ready to go.  The staff was great.  Some people in other reviews felt that the walk to breakfast was a bit of a bother but we rode our bikes everyday and loved it.  What a cool way to get to breakfast but to ride along the bike alley ways.  The breakfast is moderate but fine.  The beach club is good.  Great drinks, decent food and beautiful beach. The dive shop is wonderful as are the staff!  We HIGHLY recommend this villa and Scallywags.  (Do keep in mind it is not the four seasons when it comes to service but totally fine - you are in Gili Air).
title: Joglos 1 Villa on Gili Air

text:
Beautiful small hotel in the 'village', with a nice swimming pool and very clean and cool rooms. 
Breakfast is in the beach restaurant, a 5-10 minutes walk from the hotel. In front of the restaurant is a beautiful beach with good snorkeling spots. The restaurant has sun beds, which are free for the hotel guests.
title: Beautiful boutique hotel

text:
Its was a very long walk from the hotel to the beach, 10 mins one way. It's not a nice walk, you walk by dumpsters and other places where the locals dump their crap.

The hotel room was fine (good working airco and nice outdoor shower).

Nice place for backpackers, not a great place for a family vacation.

Not going back
title: Long walk from the beach

text:
The hotel is really good and the staff are so friendly. The whole complex is immaculate and the room extremely clean 10/10!
My only complaints are the water is cold in the morning until about 8am. I spoke to reception and they looked surprised but next morning it was the same. The guy on reception said he would speak to the "engineering" about it. I suggested that they turn the water heater on earlier!😀
Anyway, it wasn't a major problem because I was going swimming or snorkelling every morning!
The only other problem was the internet, which continually drops out. I was able to work around it but it was a little annoying! Yes...I know this is Indonesia....but!!!😀
Overall, despite these minor negatives I would come back here due to the nice staff.
title: Great hotel, great staff.....but!!!!

text: Great location, very comfortable accommodation. Breakfast was a 10 minute walk away so probably not suited to those who require room service type facilities. Nice cozy pool located on premises. There is cheaper accommodation available on the island, but if you can fork out a few more dollars, this place is well worth it.
title: Comfortable accommodation

text: Stayed for 6 days on gili air which is a lovely place to chill out and enjoy pristine waters. The smugglers is about 7 mins from the beach resort which can be a bit of a pain when it is hot and you are carrying snorkel gear. We had 2 rooms and really enjoyed the space and outside hot showers which were very good. The areas for improvement. Everyday it became a family game to guess how many towels we would be left with. There was also someone banging on the door at 7.30 am on our last morning wanting to know if we had consumed anything from the mini bar- not the best way to be woken. And finally there were some issues with the booking and the bill that did get resolved but really should have been not been an issue. Anyway would recommend it. We will be back.
title: Lovely stay. Some areas of improvement required.

text:
Very helpful staff, lovely clean rooms with a fantastic "open ceiling" shower.

The breakfast buffet was plentiful but not alltogether delicious. It was okay though. Go for the omelet or pancakes.

Would definately recommend a stay here. There are cheaper alternatives on gili air but it is good value for money.

The private pool by the rooms is nice too.
title: Clean and silent

text: The advertising is misleading because you assume that the villa is in the same proximity as the other rooms.  It isn't... it is a lot further inland and right next to the mosque.  Loud prayers start at 5am.  We paid big money for two nights, but paid extra and shifted the second night to a quiet location (we didn't tell the staff... just moved for the night and checked out as scheduled).  The other thing I found misleading was I assumed that pictures of the kitchen and living areas were located inside the house but they aren't... only the bedrooms are which means there are no living areas that are aircon.  On the positive side... the staff were great, especially the girl in the reception (beautiful nature and very helpful).  This place is not good value for money as it is one of the most expensive on the island.
title: Poor location... nice villa..the staff were great...

text:
The area is lovely and the staff really nice. 
We had meat from the bbq which was good and fresh and the fish as well but the salad from the salad bar was warm as they don't keep it fresh. 
The baked potato didn't have Have any taste. 

The place is beautiful and you can eat in front of the water.
title: Nice

text:
The service, these wonderful, kind employes, the awesome details of this hotel make it a unique place!

There are hotels which are better located on the island but we saw some rooms of them and we stick to the smugglers...
title: Best on the island, expensive but worth it, position on the island could be better

text:
From the fast boat, it is about a ten minute walk but you would probably get lost so ask for directions.

The room itself was spacious enough and I loved the outdoor bathroom concept.
I did not expect much but was stoked nevertheless.
The staff in the Smuggler's were very helpful and pleasant as well.

Breakfast options were plenty and I love options.

You could always take a walk down to the beach and hang at one of the many restaurants/bars. Gili Air isn't that huge so you could pretty much check out the entire island in a day.
title: Modern yet homey

text:
If you're after a place to relax with your partner after a day at the beach then this is perfect. The rooms are cool, clean and spacious. Free water in the rooms and fully stocked mini bar. 
Bathrooms are outdoor with hot water for a great shower. 
Breakfast is served at scallyways beach bar about a 10 minute walk in the morning past the harbour. 
Staff are al very welcoming and will do anything to help you have a good stay. Checkin is easy and quick and they will hold your bags for the day while you go relax. 
We took a horse and cart to get here from the pier because of heavy bags and not being entirely such which scallywags we had booked but it's really not far and when we checked out we walked instead to the pier, 5 minutes. 
Tickets for the boat transfers can be bought directly at the pier. To meno is cost 35,000 each. 

Only gripe is that the wifi isn't strong enough to download or have a good Skype but I don't think it was good anywhere we visited on the Gili's.
title: Cool clean rooms, small shared pool

text: This accommodation was very nice. The room was large, clean and modern. Gorgeous private patio with pretty palms and beautiful outdoor shower with deluxe rain shower head. Comfortable bed. The in room mini bar was fully stocked with drinks and yummy nibbles, catering to the westerner. Satellite tv channels with dvd player and reliable wi-fi too. Most importantly, the air con was icy cold. It is very hot on Gili Air. The rooms and accommodation are very secure so it feels very safe and private. There is a lovely shared pool which is gorgeous for an evening swim. We had to walk a few minutes each morning to another scallywags Joglo villa which they had set up for buffet breakfast, but this was no problem as it was close and the earlier you get up, the cooler the weather is! Their beach club restaurant called Scallywags is currently closed to the public which is why we had to eat breakfast in another location. The buffet breakfast options weren't huge but it was sufficient. The accommodation is located about a 10-15 minute walk from the beach, but we weren't fussed about this as we found the beach and ocean on Gili Air to be dirty and full of rubbish anyway. It is currently the month of Ramadan, which we didn't know about before our arrival and the accommodation is located close to a large mosque on the island and you will hear prayers 5x daily, starting at 4am. The Reception staff are lovely and Lalu in house keeping, is a very kind and funny person. Overall, a pleasant stay.
title: Very good accommodation on Gili Air

text:
Definitely would recommend Scallywags. The room was very comfortable and pleasant with a large private patio- and I loved the open shower. The staff were all so kind and helpful also! An unexpected bonus: they have a nice selection of movies that you can take to your room to watch.

As others have mentioned, it's a little bit of a walk from the beach, but it's nice to see another side of Gili Air aside from the main stretch.
title: Lovely retreat

text: We just keep coming back to this great little hideaway island paradise. Only great things to say about the staff, hotel and restaurant. Thank you team Scallywags for always making sure our stay is amazing, see you soon.
title: Hands up, I'm a Scallywag!

text:
Stayed at Scallywags smugglers the end of Febuary, 2016 with my boyfriend. We arrived and were very hot, and a bit disappointed to see a large group sitting in the very small office checking in before us; which meant we had to wait outside in the hot sun. After waiting outside for a few warm minutes, a young gentleman named Lalu saved us from the heat and pulled some strings to get us into our room early, and later brought the check in documents to our room let us check in inside with the AC. 
After that, We asked Lalu where we could get a large gallon of water. Without hesitation he offered and went to the store and grabbed one for us. It was such a sweet gesture as we were truly boiling and had no idea where anything was. 
I later found out Lalu isn't even management, he worked for the house cleaning crew! He went out of his way to help us all week. I think this man needs a raise!
I was disappointed by the management and regular crew from the hotel as they were always hard to find and we had to wait to get our breakfast vouchers every morning. 

All in all the hotel is clean, with beautiful rooms and FANTASTIC air-con. I would stay again. Thanks to Lalu for a great stay and exceptional service.
title: Great staff, excellent AC

text: We are smitten with this place! We tried to book a standard double room for 3 nights, but since they didn't have vacancy all 3 nights they upgraded us to Scallywags Joglo, a gorgeous private villa with a private pool, outdoor kitchen & living room, for the same price! We are in awe of how beautiful it is. Everything is incredibly clean & the staff is very helpful. A big perk of staying at Scallywags is getting a free beach bed & towel at their beach spot everyday. The free breakfast buffet is also great. Can't recommend enough.
title: The best!!

text: I absolutely love this hotel. I was in a tight spot and needed a room at the last minute. The staff are incredible. They went out of their way to make our stay so comfortable. The rooms are so clean and modern. I wish I could have stayed a week. Thank you so much for the amazing stay!
title: Amazing hotel and lovely staff

text:
After we had got over the shock that we had a ten minute walk for breakfast we settled down to really enjoy smugglers in gilli air.  The room was excellent with a half outdoor bathroom and had very good sound proofing which led to us having peaceful sleep.
It was all very private.  Sadly they forgot to service our room on our last day but that was partially rectified.  The breakfast and restaurant were excellent - some tables on the sandy beach with sunbeds in front and a dive shop to the right.  Brilliant for a lazy day of sun and swimming.  We went on two snorkel trips and found the staff very helpful.
title: Living with the locals

text:
The outdoor shower and toilet were a great aspect of staying here. Having a shower in the morning with the sun glistening over the water is a first class experience. 
The Smugglers is tucked away out of sight from the main street and therefore a quiet, peaceful place to stay. However it is within walking distance to the harbour which is a big advantage when you arrive on Gili Air. 
The beach club is joined with the Smugglers and provides breakfast. This is a 10-15 minute walk away so the location aspect discourages you from going to breakfast which is ashamed however for lying by the beach it is a good location and towels are provided. 
Overall friendly staff, good location, clean and would highly recommend staying here.
title: Quirky and quiet accommodation

text:
Every staff there is very helpful in catering to our needs. If you need to book a boat to snorkel or to other islands, they will assist you to book it. 
They will check with you if you need anything or suggestions and help you.

We stayed in the Joglo.
Overall my friends and I are very happy with Scallywags
title: Extremely helpful staff, clean rooms and comfortable beds

text: Smugglers is a little unusual as a hotel. Tucked away in the main village of Gili Air, reception is an office right on the street and the 10 rooms are accessed via large door on the street into a very private hotel space. Our room had a private walled garden that was immaculately kept. The room was clean, tidy and plenty big enough with a outdoor shower in the ensuite. There is a nice pool under shade that is relatively small but great to come back to after a hot day at the beach. There are no eating facilites here - these are at a sister property Scallywags Beach Club right on the beach in the main roam up from the ferry jetty. It is a really nice 10 min walk to the beach club for breakfast etc. Breakfast was superb - fantastic eggs station, buffet and you then get complimentary use of a daybed right out front on the beach. There is an excellent local warung and a pizza place within 2 mins walk for dinner each night as well as plenty of other eating choices. We loved 4 days there and have already booked the next visit later in the year.
title: Great place to stay

text:
We booked Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway because we wanted to get away from the hustle and bustle - Gili Air for that reason was a great choice itself already. 

The property is only a short walk away from the harbour - if you don't carry too much luggage you can walk there - it's not even 5 minutes up the road. 
The staff, especially Fai, the manager, was very polite and helpful during our entire stay. 

One small hiccup: I got an email a few days in advance asking if I needed assistance upon arrival since i was traveling with an infant I I had requested to be picked up upon booking confirmation. Fai contacted me and re-confirmed the new pick up time of 11:30 am (when the Gili Cat Fastboat arrives), but unfortunately nobody was there to pick us up. I had to call them and then one staff turned up on a bike. Not very helpful when you have a suitcase and a baby with you. 
In the end we got a horse carriage, paid by Scallywags as requested and the whole thing really only took 15 minutes to sort out, no big deal. 

The room was clean, neat and cool, black-out curtains and had all the usual amenities you'd expect. The outdoor seating area is a bit small, but again: you won't spend much time there, however the communal pool area really makes up for it. Great place for an afternoon nap! 

Breakfast was included and served at the Beach Club, I recommend to rent bikes to save you the walk every morning. It is a bit of a walk if you're travelling with children. You can even rent a bike with a child seat (from the bike rental place opposite the harbour)! 

All in all, we'd come back to Scallywags for sure, especially because the beach club opens up to one of the most beautiful beaches of the island, clean and protected shallow water, gorgeous view over Lombok, nice staff, free sun beds and towels for all Scallywags guests. Baby really enjoyed running around freely there!
title: Cute and quiet little spoy

text:
We stayed two nights in two rooms. Both rooms were clean and well kept. Ample bath towels and pool towels were supplied and the beds were super comfy. The staff were very hospitable and were always there to offer a helping hand or answer any questions we had. The only gripe is that the hotel is a 6 minute walk away from the beach. 

Upon leaving we accidentally left both our apple ipad mini and an amazon kindle ereader behind in one of the rooms. The staff were quick to respond to our emails and shipped it back to us within two days. Am amazed at the way they handled the situation and extremely grateful to them. I cannot thank you enough for making our stay such a pleasant and enjoyable experience.
title: Wonderful stay and excellent Service

text:
As stated the hotel is a bit of a walk from the Beach Club. If this bothers you - rent a bike. Otherwise - just accept it as part of the deal - and enjoy! From the outside - it looks deceptively small but the rooms are tastefully designed and spacious. Loved the front porch part of the room and the outdoor bathroom! The swimming pool was a godsend for my daughter at the end of a day on the beach! 
The beach club was a cool place to hang and chill. The beach was great and snorkelling really easy from here. Hired snorkelling gear from Scallywags Dive Centre.
title: Chilling on Gili Air

text: This is one of the nicest hotel we've ever been. Rooms are clean and spacious. Staff was very nice. They gave us bath towel and pool towel. Very good ac in room. Bathroom was clean. Place is very quite, we didn't hear any sounds from mosque. And breakfast buffet was excellent! A lot of options for vegetarians <3
title: Excellent!

text:
Great hotel with an amazing staff. Everybody were super friendly and incredibly helpful. Rooms are very nice and very clean and the terrace outside is just too cute. Next time we plan to stay even longer.
Would highly recommend it!
title: Perfect ending of our holiday

text: My boyfriend and I stayed at Scallwags Hideaway in March of 2016 and loved our experience! The staff was extremely friendly and attentive, the breakfast was absolutely delicious, and loved the access to the beach club (including fresh towels, chaise lounges, beach side service, etc.) It's about a five minute walk to the beach, right next to the covered pool, and easy to find (there are signs pointing you the right direction from the harbor). We would absolutely stay here again if we had that opportunity - Gili Air is incredible!
title: Gili Air Luxury

text:
We stayed there 4 nights and was an incredible experience. The Staff were very helpful in everything, they give us nice tips about the island. 

The room was very clean and the bathroom was very comfortable and clean as well. Beautiful room with attention to detail. The Orange & Peppermint Shampoo was a nice touch.

You have to walk about 10 minutes to the Beach club to have breakfast and for us ...that was ok because we started the day there and then we were directly to the beach almost all day. The breakfast breakfast is very complete and varied.

In the Beach Club you can have a beach bed & towels for free because you are guest... We found that great!
title: Great place to stay & sleep comfortable. Excellent service.

text: I stayed here a week while diving Gili Air. Great little boutique hotel hidden a few minutes from the beachfront. Rooms are spacious, modern and warm, bathrooms are awesome with outdoor showers. The service is fantastic. Guests have access to the Beach Club, which is one of the best places on the island to bliss out on the sand.
title: Super cute boutique hotel with excellent service

text:
The room was pretty and comfortable. Pool was small but nice.

Breakfast was a 20 minute walk away - not great when it is lashing rain incessantly for 3 days. Alleyways leading to the hotel were filthy and flooded. Most disappointing part was that the hotel charged my credit card without telling me (I had opted to pay in cash on my booking), and then still allowed us to pay in cash when we were checking out! After multiple phone calls and emails, I finally got them to agree to return the money however they said they could not refund to my credit card!! Eventually, after about 3 weeks, they transferred the money to my bank account and of course I paid the bank charges. I didn't receive any real apology or compensation, they seemed to think it was an acceptable mistake. Not overly impressed with Gili Air - stick to Trawangan!
title: Disappointing end to our holiday

text: After traveling a month in Bali,our 2 night stay at Scallywags was such a treat. Beautiful room with attention to detail, incredible food and wonderful service. Gilli Air is a gorgeous island and the Scallywags beach resort is a 5 minute bike ride from the hotel. Breakfast buffet at the beach resort included, loungers on the beach included with towel service. It was truly a few days in paradise and the daiquiris were divine!
title: a few days in paradise

owner_response.text:
Hi Burgi R,

We are very pleased to hear your 2 night stay with us at Smugglers Hideaway was a good one. Your review reveals an overall excellent experience. Please come back for another visit some day.

Scallywags Resorts
Smugglers Hideaway 
Gili Air
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Lovely location, super comfortable rooms, can't fault this place at all. Hospitality is lovely and the bathrooms are chic and funky cool. I would happily recommend this place to everyone. The internet surprisingly works decent. 10/10 on all counts (in Gilis)
title: Perfect

owner_response.text:
Hi Hassan,

Smugglers is our hidden gem. Thanks for letting us know of your experience with us, we'll be sure to let all the Scallywags staff know how happy you were staying with us. Thanks for the recommendation.

Happy Travels


Jacky
