Thanks for the 5 star review!!  We are happy to read such lovely comments about our staff and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit tot eh Gili Islands

Regards
Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Friends had recommended this location for great atmosphere and good food. It ticked both boxes. Slightly more expensive for Indonesian prices, but we chose the BBQ option where we chose meat, fish, seafood, kebabs etc to BBQ on the grill with the bonus of as much as you could eat salad bar and the yummiest french bread. 2 for 1 cocktails were great value and so ginormous I could barely finish them! They packed a punch too!
The restaurant is located right on the beach and after the day's sunbathers relinquishing their sun lounges, the staff efficiently pack them away and set up tables and chairs on the sand with torches and candles glowing in a very romantic setting.
title: Scallywags beachfront restaurant

text: Really clean, great service. Loved the use of the beach bar and ability to rent bikes. All the staff were fantastic. In the office Lalu was brilliant - even bursting into a great rendition of 'You'll never walk alone' upon learning my partner was a scouser. Mahrun in the restaurant was wonderful too, always greeted us with a smile. The only downside was the distance between smugglers and the beach bar where you have breakfast and can use the sun loungers. In the end I rather enjoyed the stroll over but would've been nice to know it's a good 10/15 walk in advance of booking. All in all had a fabulous time and value for money was next to none. We can't wait to come back.
title: Fantastic

text: Couldn’t have asked for a better resort in Gili Air. The room was spacious, modern and spotless. I really enjoyed that we had our own private patio area for relaxing after a swim. We spent every morning at the beach club relaxing on the complimentary loungers or snorkeling. The restaurant was wonderful, with a beautiful beach set up and delicious food. Can’t imagine staying anywhere else in Gili Air.
title: Ideal resort in Gili Air

text: The accommodations at Sacllywags are beautiful but what really made my visit most memorable was the staff, particularly a gentleman named Bahar (a,k.a. "Oceans").   He greeted me and made me feel welcomed, like long awaited family member finally returning home!  Without being salesman to make me feel pressure, instead it was his pleasure to provide me just enough information about the various activities on the islands, including Snorkeling Trips, Komodo adventure, Lombok Tours, Rinjani Trekking, SPA in Scallywags Trawangan and the transportation to Lombok by Scally private car and fast boat to Bali by Bluewater Express.  The most exciting and unexpected part of Bahar's hospitality, however, was that he even arranged a short term opportunity for me to go and volunteer teaching English for a few days in a school back in his home village of East Lombok.  I would never have experienced this opportunity if not for Bahar going above and beyond just checking me into the hotel. Hopefully, I will have a friend for life and look forward to visiting Gili Air again!   If you go here, definitely ask to see Bahar and ask him about Volunteer opportunities.
title: Great hotel on the beautiful island and Bahar (a.k.a "Oceans') is friendliest staff in all of Indonesia.

owner_response.text:
Dear Micheal

Wow. I want to thank you personally for this amazing comment, and tomorrow morning I will show this to Bahar. It looks like he went the extra yard to keep a guest happy, and above all make a friend. The photos are fantastic. 

Bahar is a jewel in our crown. Its comments like this that make this whole trip advisor thing worth while, rather than doom and gloom with no outcome.

I have noted your details, and I will make sure the next time you're back in town we will look after you, I know Bahar will be pleased if you do.

From me, and all of us at Scallywags, and Bahar, thank you Michael, and we look forward to seeing you back on Gili Air soonest.

Kind regards.

Ian ( assistant manager )
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Clean room, great air con, TV which makes a nice change when backpacking for a while. Feels secure. Staff were very helpful and friendly, welcome drink is a lovely touch. Clean and comfy bedding. Did the job for my solo travel. Helped to organise my onward transfer to Scallywags on Gili T by complimentary speedboat. 

Breakfast buffet included is amazing - beautiful homemade food and great cook to order stations. 

Amazing beachfront with really comfy loungers and an incredible view of Lombok. 

Would 100% return.
title: All you need when backpacking

owner_response.text:
Dear Aldon1,

Thank you for sharing your recent stay experience with other traveler around the world.
I am trilled to read your detail great comments and glad that you plan to return in the future holiday.

Kind regards,

Nyoman - Resort Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stayed at one of their 3 bed villas for a few days with my family. The villa was a reasonable walk from the  main strip near the harbour (although the main office/reception is a bit tricky to find) 

The villa itself is amazing and very clean and the staff were friendly and attentive. It was my birthday during our stay and they really went out of their way to make it special and memorable - when we went to dinner the staff sang happy bday and i got a lovely cake - so thank you guys.

You can get food delivered to the villa if you dont want to go to the restaurant for breakfast and they give you a phone connecting you to someone who can help.we lost our fastboat tickets back to bali and the manager spent a couple of hours and went to great lengths to try and help us. We were really amazed because they was well beyond their job role but we really appreciated it.

I will 100% be back to stay with you guys and would reccomend to anyone travelling to Gili Air
title: Best service i have ever experienced

owner_response.text:
Dear Loice M,

Warm greeting from Scallywags Resort Gili Island!

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent holiday experience here to other traveler around the world.
We trilled that your holiday experience with us was pleased you all the time. Your feedback to our facility for sure will be keep better and better in the future and personal services offered will maintain continuously. We are glad that all aspect of the services were meet your expectation.  
Thanks again and look forward to welcoming you again on another holiday time in near future.

Kind regards,
Nyoman - Resort Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed at Scallywags hideaway and loved the location, rooms and staff! Just minutes to the beach by bike. Great breakie at the beachside restaurant along with access to beach lounges/umbrellas and towels. We moved to Joglo villa for 2 nights and loved the 3 bedroom villa! with no fault of Scallywags I will say that to be so close to the mosque and hearing the loud prayers and chanting from 5pm till around 8pm and then it starts up again at 4.30am for an hour or so was a little distracting when you are trying to have a conversation or gathering in the villa....we had to head down to the beach so not to hear it ... bring ear plugs :). We also found it a little strange that staff wanted to enter our villa at 9pmish to check our pool???  Overall though great place to stay!
title: Great location, accommodation and wonderful staff

text: The rooms are clean and well appointed with great AC even when power went out elsewhere but the place lacks charm.  Staff were helpful and welcoming at both hotel and beach club.  Nothing to complain about at all but it felt corporate and that was not what I was expecting.
title: Did the job

text: This place really exceeded our expectations. The bathroom was outdoors and both room and bathroom were really tasty fully decorated. Bed was extremely comfy (and large) and breakfast and the scallywags restaurant was super great (especially the fresh eggs and pancakes they made on request). All the staff we came into contact with were enormously helpful, friendly and welcoming and it's a great location for the main Gili Air village, it took us about 10 mins to find it/get there from arriving at the dock. We stayed for three nights and wished we could have stayed longer!
title: Lovely, well equipped room with awesome bathroom!

text:
Honestly disappointed in a few things regarding our stay at this hotel. Unfortunately during our whole stay the pool was not in working order (closed for maintenance), we didn't research how far away we would be from restaurant & beach, staff on arrival also didn't provide these important details & next time we will definitely be choosing to stay on beach. Another miss on our research was its proximity to the local mosque which broadcasts using a very loud PA system starting at 4.30am. 
Our room was clean & a good size. Nice outdoor bathroom & a well stocked mini bar. 
Gili Air a lovely island to see & stay on but I would advise doing your research...if you want a quiet location, beach front, look around East/north side - bikes best for getting around island.
title: Average stay/experience

owner_response.text:
Hi KingHardy27
We are very sorry to hear you did not enjoy the location of Smugglers Hideaway.  Most of our guests enjoy the location amongst the local villages and the leisurely stroll to the beach, however i guess it was not for you.  The Mosque is a part of the local culture that makes the Gili's and Lombok so special, the call to prayer can be heard across the Island, so unfortunately this is something we need to accept and indeed embrace.

We have passed on your feedback to our team regarding better communications regarding location etc.

Regards
Amanda
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stayed in one of the single rooms and although basic it had all I needed and for the amazing price of £20 per night :-) 
The room had a bed, some storage, air con and a TV.
Outside there were shared toilets and showers which were great.
Also outside you could re-fill your water bottle and get tea/ coffee.
The single rooms were also enclosed via a gate which made it more secure, so you had a gate key and room key.
Breakfast was amazing, plentiful and delicious. The first decent green tea since I arrived in Bali! And hash browns! 
Right outside the restaurant for breakfast you could use their sun loungers too, on a really great part of the beach.
All staff were so friendly and helpful.
Highly recommend this place!
title: Great for solo travelers

owner_response.text:
Hi there,

As you say, the rooms are great for solo travellers, size & comfort just right for the price & all the inclusions. We have something for everyone, so pleased you enjoyed your stay at Scallywags.

Happy Travelling

The Scallywags Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Had the bbq dinner which included the all you can eat salad and we were happy. Although one tip I would recommend is pick your own meat. I just ordered the ribs and sat down but it was a very boney end cut which did not resemble 'ribs'. Our beef skewers were all very very cooked- note to r restaurant. The meal comes with baked potato, rice or fries. I had the potato which was very nice. New selection of salad and nice drinks menus. For the two of us with two drinks cost 15 pounds sterling.
title: Dinner visit. Very nice indeed

text: The description gave me the impression we were on the beach but this is not the case.however, breakfast is served in the beach club...quite a long way from the bungalows. We rented bikes to get back and forth but in hindsight these should really be complimentary due to the location of the accommodation. The bungalows were in the centre of the island, next to a mosque...so we woke every morning at 5am with 'call to prayer'. Staff were very courteous reception especially helpful. The meal at the beach club on our first night was a disaster. We went for the BBQ deal, i ordered a steak (rare) my son ordered ribs. After an hour's wait for food, My steak arrived cold and my son's ribs were totally overcooked, tough and impossible to eat. When my food came i ordered a bottle of red wine to have with it, checking i could take whatever i didn't drink wth me when leaving. Eventually a glass of wine arrived, when my dinner as already finished. I hadn't the will left to complain at that stage. For the prices the beach club charges in comparison to other places, this is really unacceptable. Pool is small but nice, pool area also really small...not suitable for spending much time. As I said the room itself was lovely, equipped with all travellers needs, the bathroom also. only problem was the leaking airconditioner that i only noticed once i'd left my bag on the unit underneath. :(
title: lovely bungalow, not a great location

text: A great, clean, very comfortable room, just a short walk from the coastal road, (nothing is really far on this island, but note this is not on the beach).  Nice outside seating area, and reasonably priced.  Staff are excellent, and extremely helpful.  We were originally booked into Scallyways Mango Motel, but asked to move to Smugglers.  It was no hassle, and a much better option.
title: Spacious, comfortable, neat and tidy

text:
All the staff in Scallywags are very friendly and helpful. Comfortable bed and have lots of dvd to rent so you could snuggle in the bed all day if you don't feel like sunbathing by the beach. Must rent their bicycles, they are the best in the island. We tried Discovery Scuba Diving with their diving team too.. very professional and we managed to see turtles! Only downside is the hotel is situated near to a mosque, but only during sunset time that it affected us a little. 
Nevertheless, still truly enjoyed our stay here, highly recommended!
title: Great service and superb bike

text:
Scallwags was a boutique hotel on gili trawangan. Hotel was visited in August so being the busy season hotel was full.

Rooms are large and with the outdoor showers and bathroom - different

Guests vary from all areas of the world and the staff are efficient in their work.

Overall nothing that either detracts from the hotel service nor gives any specific outstanding feature . 

Hotel is recommended for couples as mots rooms and services are geared towards this.

External restaurant again is acceptable. Hotel endeavors to offer all cuisine and services

Would recommend that visits are not undertaken in the high season
title: Nice hotel

text:
Scalleywags is the only hotel in three weeks of travel in both Bali and the Gili islands that I found a sad, overpriced disappointment.  For half the price one can get a room at over a dozen small hotels right on the water with a view, ocean breezes  and a pool.  

Scalleywags is located in a hot, dirty, airless neighborhood five blocks from the water and eight blocks from their advertised 'beach club'.  Although I requested a single at booking I was charged for the full price of a double ( staff saying that was all they had)  including the charge for two breakfasts each day without any deduction or other option and yet when it came to providing water,  welcome juice voucher, or towels they gave me only enough for one.  Even then I had to to ask for water!  

At Scallywags Beach Club on Gili Air,  I watched workers carefully rake the beach and then spend half an hour tossing the garbage collected (including 5 gallon gas cans and large plastic bundles) into the sea.  I asked why they would do this.  A staff member said that the place next door throws it in and it washes up on their beach so they are just moving it down the beach with the currents!    If the Gilis are to survive as a desirable destination, more than anything, the Gilis need to develop and implement a waste management plan.  Garbage is everywhere on land, beaches and the sea.  I walked over it, swam through it and saw it burning in piles including plastics polluting the once pristine air.  Tourists create it and workers,  who are imported from Lombok, don't care- it is not their home.  This once pristine, isolated and beautiful corner of the planet is now drowning in garbage on the land and the sea.

Avoid Scalleywags hotels and beach club- find a place along the water with breezes and views without the overcharging and blatant garbage tossing.  I do not know how they got their rating.  It was not at all accurate.  The room was clean and air conditioning worked- that is all I can say for it.

Better yet- stay in Bali.  The water is cleaner and the people take pride in their homes, businesses and communities.
title: Avoid Scallywags

text:
Absolutely recommended. The restaurant is very good, one of the best on the island. Rooms are cozy and super clean. The staff is friendly and helpful. The only thing to bear in mind is that rooms are a bit far away from the beach, like 10 mins walk, so renting bikes is recommended. The beach is very nice, the staff will provide everything. It's not super nice that lots of boats stop in front of the beach from 11 am on, though. 
We had a very nice stay and would totally come back at Scallywags.
title: Cozy, nice, friendly staff!

text: We had such a lovely stay at Smugglers hideaway. All the staff were lovely and helpful. The manager was really helpful and friendly and helped us out. Room was great, bathroom and shower were sensational! Got around the island on bikes which was a lot of fun. Can not wait to come back!
title: Beautiful villa accommodation and lovely staff

text: Would highly recommend staying with anyone of the scallywags accommodation. We stayed on Gili T and Gili Air and we were treated extremely well by all the staff from the guys on the boat to the hotel staff. Don't look no further than here you won't regret it :))
title: Romantic holiday..

text: I stayed in Smugglers Hideaway for 4 nights and it was great.  Don't be concerned that it is a short walk (Less than 10 Min!) away from the main area in Gili Air - this is what makes it great.  You walk through the local village and houses giving a very local experience - excellent during Raya!  The rooms is nice and comfortable and quiet!  While the rooms are close by you feel like you are in your own bungalow. Air conditioning was great and staff was very helpful going out of their way to make sure I had transportation back to Lombok when taxis weren't available.  Thanks for making the stay fantastic.  Breakfast and dinner at the main restaurant a short walk away is also very excellent - service, quality and price
title: Nice relaxing stay!  Clean, Comfortable and Unique

text:
Smugglers Hideaway was a fantastic 4 night experience. Based in the local village gave a peaceful serene feel to the place. Inside the walls was a beautiful pool, always to ourselves. Even though the rooms are all close together it has been made to feel like you're the only ones there with private front garden. The outdoor bathrooms were very clean, rooms also. Fab mini bar & large selection of movie channels for quiet nights in. The beach club was fantastic. A 10minute cycle away, the breakfast and coffee were brilliant. We ended up eating here most nights too as the staff knew us and the food was outstanding!
Highly recommended to our friends and family.
Much preferred Gili Air to Trawangan too.
title: Exceptional beauty

text:
If you don't mind being away from the beach and the walk towards the interior of the island to get here then make sure you choose to stay here!! The Smugglers is the budget option of Scallywags accommodation but you definitely don't miss out. For the same price as places on the water front (with less value for money) whoever planned these rooms really thought of everything...including berocca!!!
Unfortunately we didn't find this place until the last few days of our stay on Gili Air but considering our experience the first time we will no doubt stay here again the next time we're back on the island.
title: A private, tropical hideaway

text: Scallywags Smugglers is a great place to stay, the rooms are spacious, there's a gorgeous indoor/outdoor shower. Great pool just for guests which never seemed crowded. The staff were really helpful. Smugglers is back from the beach a little but not too far, hiring a bicycle is a great way to get around. Would highly recommend.
title: Fantastic accommodation

text:
A lovely boutique hotel with super comfortable king beds, quiet and efficient a/c, a loaded and affordably-priced mini-bar with snacks of all sorts and including beer, cold rosé and Chardonnay Plaga wine (a pleasant surprise after our 2h boat ride), outdoor designer bathroom, beautiful pool and private terrace.
On the downside: it's out of the way and about a 5-8-min walk from the beach (which for an island that you can walk all the way around in 1h-1.5h with almost everything right on the beach is significant) and their restaurant is quite far to take advantage of the included breakfast (located on the beach about 10-12 min walk from the hotel). Rooms have no view whatsoever. We had a room very close to the machine room which was very noisy but with the door closed we couldn't hear anything; it was one of the quietest rooms we ever had.  We had a great night's sleep and would definitely go back.
title: Heavenly night and a great mini-bar

text:
My boyfriend and I spend 6 nights at smugglers, and loved every minute of it. We only booked one night, but kept extending our stay. It was very modern and clean. As we went to smugglers we thought it seemed out of the way, but it wasn't far away from shops and cafes. 

It truly was a hidden paradise, and it feels like you have your own little private villa. We were some of the only people staying at the place at this time, which made our stay even more relaxing! 

The service was excellent, you get two bottles of water each day, and they can help you arrange great trips. Anything - they will be happy to help, and you can always find them.

In the room there are robes, a safety box, hairdryer, tv, minibar (with everything!) AND dvd player! (Which was great, they also have a bunch of great new dvds you can borrow.) The rooms also had great aircon. The room wasn't made out of bamboo which meant NO bugs or animals!  

The pool area, was very relaxing, comfortable new sun beds with large pool towels, and a lovely small pool.  

The Scallywags restaurant offered great buffet breakfast with both Indonesian and Western choices. 

Pros: 
- It's in a peaceful, and quiet area. 
- Large room, with nice private terrace, and outdoor spacious bathroom. 
- Fresh water from shower, tap and in pool (not common on the island) 
- Net/shade over the pool area
- Free use of Scallywags beach sunbeds 
- There is umbrellas and a torch (Good for the rainy season, and torch is good at night)
- Superb wifi in room and at the pool area

Cons: 
- Not straight out to the beach, but only 7 minute walk to the beach 

We had a very good stay here, and will without a doubt stay again if we come back one day!
title: Hidden paradise!

owner_response.text:
Hi Hannah,

Thanks for your review, it sounds like you had a very good time with us on Gili Air. Smugglers Hideaway is our newest resort & as you say not far from the beach. If that the only con you had about us is that it's not actually on the beach then we are happy we made you happy. Please come back again.

See you next time.

The Team at Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed here in August and really enjoyed it. We can't wait to go back!

The rooms are exactly what you want when staying in the Gilis. Simple, clean and comfortable. The bathroom is great and I love the dark stonework. The shower drain did have issues but this was seriously minor. The pool was divine after a day of diving because of the sun shade it was always cool. We often felt we had our own private plunge pool because not many seemed to use the pool, which was a fabulous treat for us! The staff are amazing and go out of their way to make sure your stay is fabulous....and they are so good with kids....our son just loved them all and when it was time to leave he got very sad and was refusing to go. The walk to the restaurant is a nice stroll through the local village and we actually enjoyed it and got to know a few locals. We had a great time here.
title: Great Time!  Great Place!  Great Staff!  Can't Wait to Return!

text: Stayed at smugglers for one night after staying at their place on a Gilli T for four nights. What a difference. The rooms are new and very pleasant. Pool is very small but cool as they had the foresight to put shade cloth over it. The staff are so much more friendlier than on the other island and the service is fantastic.The only issue we had was a horrible dose of food poison caused by a dodgy goats cheese salad.
title: Better than Gilli T

text: Stayed 3 nights at Smugglers on Gili Air in October 2013. Chose this one to have the luxuries like air con and a pool, and it was a lovely little oasis. It is a bit of a walk from the beach through the village, so if you're staying with young children and want right next to the beach, Scallywags also has accommodation right next to their beachfront bar and restaurant, but for us, Smugglers was great. Just picked up some bikes for the three days so we could get around easily. After trying some of the other restaurants, we ended up going back to eat at Scallywags all the time, think it was the pick of the island. Smugglers accommodation was beautiful, clean and quiet. Recommend it!
title: Nice one

owner_response.text:
Hi Christine,

We are so very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us at our resort Smugglers Hideaway. It's our newest addition to the Scallywags Resorts. Mostly it hasn't bothered people to have a short 10 minute walk away from the restaurant & beachfront. It's actually very nice to meander through the village along the shaded walk ways. You have to remember your torch at night which the housekeeping staff leave in your room. Gili Air is an easy island to get around & hiring bicycles is a very good idea.

Thanks for trying the Scallywags Experience
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Sui siti di prenotazione ( Booking) si leggeva che la nostra struttura era fronte spiaggia e che avevamo una piscina privata ad uso esclusivo 
In realta appena arrivati ci siamo accorti che la piscina era in comune con tutti gli altri utenti !!( allora perché scrivere che era privata??? Anche perche abbiamo prenotato li apposta) 
E che la camera non era fronte spiaggia come era riportato ma al centro dell isola 
Sul sito inoltre era chiaramente riportata la possibilità di avere la colazione in camera e anche questo non corrispondeva al vero , anzi bisognava fare 7/8 min a piedi per andare a colazione ( entro le 10 del mattino!!) 
In ultimo il wi fi non funzionava
title: Deludente e non corrispondente a quanto riportato

text:
Scallywags
Sono stata qui quattro notti ad Agosto, premettendo che il livello delle infrastrutture a Gili Air è molto inferiore rispetto a quello di Gili Meno, ho scelto lo Scallywags perché sembrava offrire standard più alti rispetto alla media.
La struttura è situata vicino al porto e raggiungibile con una passeggiata di pochi minuti. Purtroppo non dispone di una vera reception, quando si arriva spesso è chiusa e viene indicato un numero di telefono (non tutti hanno una SIM locale) e bisogna attendere che l'interessato arrivi tramite il passaparola dei locali. Le camere sono carine con un piccolo patio privato e dotate di aria condizionata, bello anche il bagno esterno comunque riparato con tettoia. La cosa piu grave, a mio avviso, risulta la mancanza di un telefono in camera nonchè di personale alla reception, impossibile trovare qualcuno a cui rivolgersi in caso di bisogno. Le camere vengono rifatte alle 17.30 del pomeriggio, ovvero quando si vorrebbe rientrare dalla spiaggia per riposarsi.. La mattina del secondo giorno l'acqua delle docce non arrivava, quindi non ho potuto lavarmi. La colazione è davvero mediocre ed è servita nel ristorante sulla spiaggia, ad una decina di minuti a piedi dalle camere. Il beach Club è situato su una delle spiagge più belle dell'isola perché non risente del fenomeno delle maree, i lettini e gli ombrelloni per gli ospiti della struttura sono gratuiti. I prezzi del ristorante e del bar sulla spiaggia, tuttavia, sono molto più elevati rispetto agli standard dell'isola. Infine, abbiamo dovuto pagare il noleggio delle biciclette anche se su Booking era indicato che erano gratuite per gli ospiti, pur facendolo presente al personale, siamo stati costretti a pagare 50k al giorno. Inoltre confermo la vicinanza alla moschea che trasmette la preghiera mediante potenti megafoni all'una di notte, alle 5.30 e alle 6.30 del mattino. In conclusione, considerato il prezzo e la mancanza totale di assistenza, mi sentirei di consigliare di affittare una villa con piscina più vicina alla spiaggia, liberi di scegliere dove fare colazione ogni giorno..
title: Non vale il prezzo

text:
Nous avons séjourné 4 nuits à l'hôtel Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway en Juillet 2019
Le concept de cet hôtel est un peu particulier car il est situé dans le centre du village alors que le "coeur de l'hôtel se situe à 10 minutes à pied (plage, restaurant, breakfast, centre de plongée...). De ce côté là, rien à redire. La plage est belle, le restaurant très bien, les gens adorables.
Mon avis "médiocre" est donc là pour pénaliser l'emplacement du scallywags smugglers. 
Il faut savoir que cet hôtel est situé à 100m de la grande mosquée de l'île. donc, dès 4H30 du matin, la première prière retentie de façon extrèmement forte (réellement impossible de dormir). A 100m de la mosquée, vous êtes aux premières loges. 
D'autant qu'il y'a plein d'autres hôtels sur l'île qui vous permettent de ne rien entendre. 
De plus, les chambres sont modernes... mais manquent cruellement de charmes comparativement aux hôtels que nous avons pu avoir à Bali.
Quand à la phot de la belle piscine qui apparait sur la photo de tripadvisor, ce n'est pas la bonne. Il y'a bien une piscine, toute petite, et d'intérieur. Peu d'intérêt à mon sens
title: Parfait pour un réveil très matinal

text:
Merveilleuse semaine au calme avec un personnel toujours souriant et discret. Plage au top où le petit dej copieux est servi je recommande++++
Chambre propre piscine agréable avec les enfants c'est parfait
title: Superbe hotel

text:
Hôtel super propre. Personnel à l'écoute et attentif. Chambre parfaitement décorée.
Petite piscine intérieure agréable et fraîche. 

Le petit déjeuner se prend au scallywags beach à 5min en vélo et 10min à pied, car l'hôtel se trouve au centre, ce qui est pratique pour rayonner dans toute les directions. 
Comme vous êtes client vous pouvez profiter gratuitement des bains de soleil et serviette de prêt. Une autre piscine est disponible à la plage. 

Tout le monde est au petit soin, c'est vraiment agréable et facile. 
Le personnel parle bien anglais, la mangeuse NiLu est super souriante et toujours la en cas de besoin. 

Comme vous séjourner au scallywags, vous
title: Séjour parfait

text:
nous tenions a conseiller cet établissement qui dans une situation tragique suite au séisme a fait preuve d'un accompagnement exceptionnel de ses clients
ils ont mis a disposition leur propre bateau pour évacuer leurs clients sur lombok 
Certains devaient avoir tout perdu même des proches ce qui ne les a pas empêchés de nous aider avec le sourire "un exemple a retenir "
avant le séisme nous pouvons dire que 
les maisons sont très confortables, le ménage est fait tous les jours et la propreté du jardin est très agréable.
Le personnel toujours là pour quoi que ce soit
après la reconstruction de l'île, c'est là qu'il faut aller
vous pouvez compter sur nous pour vous conseiller les yeux fermés
un grand merci
david karine et les enfants
title: le meilleur des établissement de gili air

text: Fina och rena rum, mycket trevlig personal och mysig liten pool på hotellet. Att man har inkluderad frukostbuffe & sunbeds på scallywags beachclub som bara ligger en bit bort vid stranden är ett stort plus! Man kan även få 10% på beachcluben om man vill dyka/ta dykcertifikat.
title: Rekommenderar!

owner_response.text:
Hi Niki,

So glad you loved our place, thanks so much for your review, please come back again soon

Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Prima, heerlijk eten, leuk de tafeltjes op het strand; ontbijt lunch en diner, heerlijke BBQ , vriendelijk personeel kort en bondig: prima
Heerlijk ontbijt, wel weer iets te wrong keus voor Westers ingestelden, maar je moet iets te zeuren hebben.
title: Gili Air

owner_response.text:
Hi there, nice to hear from you, sounds like you enjoyed yourselves

Scallywags Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: L'endroit n'est pas très facile à trouver, dans une petite ruelle étroite du village mais une fois que l'on passe les portes de l'hôtel on se retrouve dans un petit coin tranquille. Chaque chambre a sa propre terrasse privée et ombragée, les chambres sont très grandes, propres et très bien équipées. Salles de bains avec la douche ouverte sur l'extérieur. Le gros avantage de Scallywags c'est le restaurant et la plage privée qui est la plus belle du sud ouest de Gili Air. Le petit déjeuner buffet est très bien et, en tant que résident, vous avez droit à un transat et une serviette chaque jour et c'est très appréciable. En revanche vivre dans le village n'a pas que des avantages : pas de vue sur mer évidemment et chambre sombre puisque très protégée... En ayant fait le tour de l'île, j'irais plutôt voir sur la côte ouest où les plages sont magnifiques et plus sauvages. Mais attention ça construit de partout...
title: Très bonnes prestations

photos.caption: Le patio qui dessert les chambres

text:
Vi bodde där i 4 nätter, rummet var av hög standard för ön, priset lågt och servicen utmärkt. 
Det finns bara 10 rum på hotellet men Scallywag har flera andra ställen på ön som verkar hålla samma standard.
På hotellet finns även pool och man kan låna filmer/böcker och fylla på med vatten i receptionen. 
Frukosten åts på deras restaurang vid stranden. En bra buffé med rätt mycket och mer att beställa om man vill.
Hotellet ligger väldigt centralt på ön, ca 5 min gång till hamnen, under 10 min till deras restaurang och ca 15-20 min till solnedgångssidan. Det tar ungefär 1,5 h att gå runt hela ön och om man vill kan man låna cyklar för ca 50.000 IDR.

Vi älskade stället och vet vart vi kommer vända oss nästa gång vi ska till Gili.
title: Verkligen en gömd skatt

text: Kanon trevliga vid check-in. Väldigt hjälpsamma och pratar bra engelska. Jätte fina rum, snyggt, städat ja otroligt bra. Varit 2 veckor runt Bali och Lembongan, fast nu önskar vi att vi åkt hit från början.
title: Underbart.

text:
Nous avons été très heureux de découvrir cet endroit qui nous donnait l’impression d’avoir notre petit paradis sur l’île de Gili Air.

Egy fut fantastique comme préposé à l’accueil et s’assurer que tout était ok pour nous durant les 3 nuits où nous sommes restés.
title: Endroit magnifique

text:
Mig og en veninde besøgte Scallywags på Gili Air i februar og havde fantastisk besøg. 

Super mad fra grillen og super hyggelig stemning. 

Servicen er virkelig høj og manageren Aya er meget sympatisk og hjælpsom. Han gjorde virkelig vores besøg til en ekstraordinær oplevelse. 

Helt klart et besøg værd!
title: Sikke et fantastisk sted!

owner_response.text:
Dear Kirstine F,

Thank you for the time to share your recent experience on your last visit to Scallywags Gili Air with other traveler here in TripAdvisor.
I glad that you are very happy wit the service and ambience of our place. Thank you also to mention that Arya, one of our team that he delivered a personal and professional standard of service that made you leave a memorable experience. Thanks again, and look forward to having you again in next holiday time to Gili Islands.

Kind regards,
Nyoman
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Ett undangömt paradis! Fräscha och fina rum, utmärkt personal. En idyllisk cykeltur till frukostbuffén som ligger nere på stranden. Stort tack till Satya,Herman,Hamzan,Bayo,Rizal,
Agus,Egy,Jon som alltid såg till att vi fick bästa servicen. 
Vi hade bokat 3 nätter men valde att stanna ytterligare några dagar. 
Tveka inte, boka! 

Freja & Oda
title: Paradis på Gili Air

owner_response.text:
Dear Freja J,

Thank you for your time to share your recent stay experience with other traveler around the world.
I trilled to read your excellent and detail feedback that all aspect of our services are made you happy and even made you to stay longer with us. And yes, we always strive to offer the highest level of the best personal services to every customers. 
Thank you to mention some of our team from the front line up to the beach club team that made you a memorable experience. I will share this to them and they will be more enthusiastic in their role for sure. 
Please feel free to contact us again, should you plan for your next holiday time to Gili Islands.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Pro:
- schöne Zimmer
- Frühstück in Ordnung
- nettes Personal
- kleiner privater Pool
- ruhig
- unweit vom Hafen

Contra:
- 4 Moskitos im Zimmer
- 15 min Gehweg zum Strand (Ort des Frühstücks - schlecht wenn es regnet)
- etwas abgelegen
title: In Ordnung...

text:
Chambre correcte pas le grand luxe  (tâches au sol, peinture un peu abimée au plafond). Fait le job sans plus.
La petite piscine est fort sympathique.
Il faut vraiment marcher 10 bonnes minutes (mieux vaut passer par le village que par le port qui est sale) le matin pour aller prendre le petit déj. Le petit déj est correct et vous avez le choix il y en a pour tous les goûts !
Le personnel est dans l'ensemble sympa. Un stagiaire était particulièrement gentil aimable et serviable.
Les sunbeds sur la plage sont appréciables et bien entretenus.
 On est près d'un spot ou vous pouvez voir plein de poissons.
Il y a une laundry très bien juste à côté de l'hôtel.
title: Correct pas l'endroit du siècle

text:
Das Zimmer war sehr schön und sauber. Haben uns direkt wohl gefühlt. Der Weg zum Restaurant war völlig in Ordnung, allerdings mussten wir uns die Fahrräder leider selbst mieten. 
Das Restaurant ist ebenfalls super, das Essen qualitativ gut. Sehr zu empfehlen ist das BBQ abends. Allerdings liegt alles preislich deutlich über den benachbarten Lokalen und anderen Unterkünften, was nicht unbedingt gerechtfertigt ist. Daher der Punkt Abzug.
title: Sehr zu empfehlen aber etwa überteuert

text:
Nous sommes restés 3 nuits dans cet Hôtel et avons passé un tres bon séjour.
Le personnel est agréable. La chambre propre avec une petite terrasse et une salle de bain extérieure privative.
Les petits déjeuners sont pris au restaurant sur la plage à 10 petites minutes de marche de l'hôtel. Tres bon Buffet avec des pancakes et des œufs faits à la demande.
L'hôtel propose gratuitement des transats sur la plage  pour les clients de l'hôtel.
La plage est sublime avec une eau turquoise. Vraiment un superbe souvenir.
Et les moniteurs du club de plongée sont tres sympas!
Je recommande vivement ce Lieu pour des vacances magiques sur Gili Air!
title: Hôtel à recommander

text: Ho soggiornato a Scallywags per quattro giorni, il personale molto gentile e sempre disponibile, la stanza molto carina e pulita. Il ristorante mi è piaciuto molto si mangiava bene ed era sul mare, inoltre l'albergo da a dispozione gli ombrelloni e i lettini per tutto il giorno. La colazione ricca e varia. Lo consiglio!
title: Buon soggiorno

text: Hotelkamer was prima. Gedeelde 'tuin' met een ander huisje. Kamer was schoon en kon dvd gratis huren. Enige nadeel was de afstand naar de beachclub waar ook het ontbijt was en ligbedden. Personeel was super vriendelijk. Was mijn tweede keer maar op gili air geen andere voor mij.
title: Prima hotel

text:
Nous sommes restés 3 jours sur Gili Air et donc 3 jours au Scallywags smugglers. Tout était parfait : l’accueil du staff de l'hôtel, la sympathie du staff du restaurant, la taille de la chambre et de la salle de bain, la propreté des lieux privés et communs.
S'ajoutent à cela, le petit déj' (compris dans l'offre) à aller prendre au restaurant (5-10minutes à pied) en bordure de mer turquoise! Le pti déj est un buffet à volonté de sucré et de salé, tous les goûts y sont présents. Le fait d'être dans cet hôtel nous permet aussi de bénéficier gratuitement des transats de la plage. Nous sommes tomber amoureux de Gili Air et c'est aussi en partie grâce à Scallywags. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés... mais mieux vaut les ouvrir un peu, l'île est vraiment sympa ;-) Scallywags dispose également d'une équipe de plongée (Scallywags divers) que nous recommandons vivement.
title: Valeur sûre sur Gili Air

text: Mi aggrego alle altre recensioni fatte degli altri viaggiatori. Nota poco dolente: è vero, il ristorante dista una pigra camminata di 10 minuti dalla struttura principale, ma è direttamente all'unica spiaggia dell'isola che è balneabile per tutto il giorno. Si mangia quasi direttamente sulla sabbia e per gli ositi di Scallywags sono riservati gli ombrelloni in prima fila. Tutte le consumazioni del giorni possono essere anche caricate direttamente sulla stanza. Ergo: anche se il ristorante fosse nella struttura principale, la strada per andare in spiaggia bisogna comunque fare.
title: il problema del ristorante "lontano"

text: Nous logions dans la villa joglo2, villa tres spacieuse pour 6 personnes avec piscine privée, salon, grande cuisine, jardin... des velos sont mis a disposition, c'est indispensable pour se balader sur l'ile et pour rejoindre le restaurant situé sur la plage ou des transats sont mis a notre disposition. Le personnel est adorable, le service rapide et efficace quelles que soient nos demandes : repas, reservation de bateaux pour snorkeling, billets retour pour bali... un excellent sejour au scallywag !
title: Excellent sejour !

text:
Nous y sommes restés 3 nuits .
Chambre magnifique, spacieuse et très propre.
Nettoyée chaque jour ce qui est appréciable avec tout le sable qu'on ramène. 
Personnel au top.
A 5-10 minutes de la plage et du restaurant de l'hôtel. 
Seul point négatif la prière très bruyante qui dure au moins 20 minutes à 5 heures du matin. 
Autre recommandation : attention aux transferts en fast boat, nous sommes nombreux sur l'île à avoir rencontré des problèmes, soit de gros retard, soit de surbooking ....
Négociez bien les tarifs et présentez vous bien à l'avance au port.  
Sinon pour l'hôtel vous ne serez pas déçus  !
title: Vraiment un hôtel à recommander

owner_response.text:
Dear Celine,

We're pleased you enjoyed your stay with us at Smugglers Hideaway, it is a little oasis, we hope you return some day

The team at Scallywags Gili Air
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Nouveau séjour de 6 jours dans la villa joglo1 au top, super piscine, super personnel, le tout est très agréable, le petit dej et le resto au top, le personnel du resto nickel (mahrun très sympa notamment) je ne peux que conseiller!!
title: Top encore une fois

text:
Nous y avons passé 4 jours en famille. La chambre "supérieure" (double) est très bien et très confortable. La chambre économique (simple) est en revanche extrêmement minimaliste  (mais cela doit être mis en relation avec le prix tout aussi minimaliste).
Petits déjeuners excellents, personnel très serviable et sympathique. Aucune difficulté pour ajouter un extra bed dans chaque chambre (250 par nuit et par lit).
Bref très bien. Seul point négatif : la proximité de la mosquée ce qui garantit quelques réveils nocturnes.
title: Hôtel très agréable

text:
Nous étions logé au Scallywags Smugglers Hideaway Joglo 2, villa privé composé de 3 chambres réparties dans la même batisse avec cuisine, salle à manger et salon et summun piscine privée. Le PDJ était inclus, avec le restaurant à 7-10mn à pied (dérangeant de prime abord, mais à l'usage: pas de problème). Vélo + Wifi inclus dans la prestation.
PDJ très copieux, plage et transit mis à disposition.
title: Villa privé pour 8 personnes

owner_response.text:
Hi Mykiet,

We are pleased you enjoyed your stay in our private pool villa, we hope you visit us again on your next holiday to the Gili Islands.

Thanks,


Scallywags Gili Air
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Nous venons de passer 3 jours dans la villa joglo2 avec 3 chambres et piscine privée en famille et nous recommandons vivement.
La villa est sublime, chaque chambre avec une grande salle de bain extérieure.
La piscine est trés agréable. Nous avions des vélos à dispo à l'arrivée indispensable pour se déplacer sur l'ile.
Le restaurant est trés bon et se trouve à qques minutes à vélo de la villa.
Nous avions nos transats sur la plage.
Bref super séjour, merci au personnel et au manager qui sont au petit soin.
title: Séjour parfait

text:
Hôtel très bien noté et c'est normal.
Situé en retrait de la plage sur Gili Air, il faut faire un peu de marche à pied pour rejoindre le restaurant de l'hôtel qui lui est situé sur la plage. Possibilité de réserver des transats gratuitement si vous êtes clients pour la journée.
Gili Air est d'un calme bienfaiteur après Gili Trawangan. L'île est certes touristique mais c'est nettement moins frénétique que sa consoeur.
L'hôtel Scallywags est bien inséré dans cette ambiance calme...
Les chambres sont fraiches et à l'ombre. Bien équipées elle dispose aussi d'une salle de bain en plein air et d'une petite terrasse.
Nous nous y sommes sentis très bien durant notre séjour et y retournerions avec plaisir.
title: Un des meilleurs hôtels sur Gili Air

text:
Familj på fyra. Kunde boka tre nätter med fördelaktigt pris i en av deras villor Joglo. Stor egen minivilla, pool, tre sovrum och trädgård med ingen insyn. Mycket trevlig känsla med hög service och trevlig personal. Rekommenderas varmt! 
Gili Air var en trevlig upplevelse, så även Gili Meno, vi besökta alla tre öarna. Vi återvänder gärna!
title: Stort och bra boende med egen pool, rekommenderas!

owner_response.text:
Hi Monica,

Lovely to read your review, we look forward to seeing you again.

Thanks,

Scallywags Gili Air
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
On avait deux chambres, un double très, très confortable et ma fille une simple, très très simple mais propre.
La piscine est tout petite mais a le mérite d'exister. Il faut marcher un petit peu pour rejoindre la zone restaurant-plage.
Le petit dej en buffet est au top. N'hésitez pas à demander des pancakes, ils sont délicieux. On peut réserver des transats inclus avec la chambre et profiter du sable fin. On serait bien resté mais il n'y avait plus de place.
title: Très confortable et un petit dej au top

text:
Först och främst: Jag rekommenderar verkligen att besöka Gili air, en underbar ö som absolut får en femma. Måste du då absolut bo här? Nej, det finns säkert många liknande ställen och säkert mysigare också till samma pris. Det finns pool men den är liten och har bara lite sol. Bungalowen är ok. Vi bodde i nr 11 och hade en mysig terass där. 

Beachklubben ca 10 -15 min promenad från hotellet har en fin strand med tillhörande solstolar och det tyckte jag mycket om. Att ligga där och titta ut över hav och strand är helt underbart. Där äter du också frukost och den är ok. Bananpannkakorna smakar bra. Jag är dock väldigt besviken på lunchen som inte var god och det var besvärligt att ändra i beställningen. 

Personalen är hjälpsam och trevlig.
title: Boende med beachclub

text:
Je suis descendu au Scallywags Smugglers au cours d'un voyage de 3 semaines à Bali en mai/juin 2017.
J'ai enchaîné plus d'une quinzaine d'hôtels de tous les genres et de toutes catégories.
Le Scallywags Smugglers est celui où j'ai passé les meilleurs moments.
Tout d'abord, l'île de Gili Air est encore un lieu précieux et assez authentique. J'espère que cette îlôt ne perdra pas son âme.
Le Scallywags Smuggler: personnel très serviable et souriant, ma chambre DeLuxe pas immense mais confortable, déco de bon goût et de qualité. Propre, bonne literie, minibar bien rempli, coffre-fort, clim, jardinet élégant et salle de douche semi-ouverte bien sympa.
L'ensemble est vraiment agréable et la petite piscine très calme et connexe aux chambres constitue un havre dont l'agrément est appréciable.
L'hôtel ne se situe pas en bord de plage. Il faudra rejoindre le restaurant et les transats qui s'y trouvent, à quelques centaines de mètres des chambres. Ce n'est pas déplaisant du tout de s'y rendre de bon matin en 3 minutes avec le vélo gracieusement mis à disposition par l'hôtel.
En revanche, il ne serait pas honnête de l'omettre, les chambres sont proches de la mosquée de l'île. J'y étais en période de Ramadan et l'imam ne m'a pas épargné la diffusion de ses prêches sur hauts-parleurs, parfois à 4h du mat'... A dire vrai, je n'ai pas raffolé mais cela fait partie de la culture Indonésienne, nous sommes ici en terres musulmanes à un jet de pierre de Lombok.
Le petit déjeuner est un buffet classique où vous trouverez ce qui convient à votre appétit du matin. Je n'ai pas goûté les autres repas.
Par ailleurs, le club de plongée de l'hôtel jouxte ce restaurant de plage. Pour vos plongées, il y a, sur demande, la possibilité d'être accompagné de Camille une charmante instructrice française (trilingue, Ang+Esp) que je recommande tout particulièrement.
Également, une autre jeune et souriante Française (ou Belge ou Suisse, je ne sais pas exactement, et aussi au minimum tri ou quadrilingue) a en charge le staff de l'hôtel ce qui facilitera la vie des francophones.
Je conclus sur un bon rapport qualité prix.
Pour ma part, j'ai eu un peu de mal à quitter le Scallywags Smugglers.
J'y aurais bien prolongé mon séjour de quelques jours...
title: Très bon établissement

text: Chambre clean et spacieuse. Belle douche et propre climatisée. Personnel poli et sympa. Petit dejeuner complet et gourmand sur la plage. Acces aux transat gratuit. Pret de velo pour aller de la chambre a la plage. 10min a pieds. Mosque pas loin mais pas trop genant. Bon plan.
title: Tres bonne qualité

text: Está ligeramente alejado de todo el bullicio de las calles mas transitadas. Da pereza por la mañana tener que desplazarse hasta el Scallywags de la playa para desayunar, pero si te vas con todo ya preparado, es genial, porque enlazas el desayuno con una mañana genial en la playita! Tienen opción de tumbonas y sombrilla (que para los que se alojan es gratuito, al menos en temporada baja), y aunque para hacer snorkel hay que caminar un poco hacia arriba la playa (justo delante de su local ya no hay arrecife), no hay tanto paso de gente. Los desayunos están genial. Y además disponen de un club de buceo gestionado por ellos, con el que hicimos una inmersión, y estuvo genial. La habitación que nos dieron era muy cómoda, y grande. Y la zona de la piscina es preciosa, y muy tranquila.
title: Muy contenta con la elección

text:
Reservamos este hotel por sus buenos comentarios,por su buena puntuación y por las fotos que vimos tanto de las habitaciones como la playa.
Al llegar nos llevamos la primera decepción,si la playa es como se ve en las fotos,el restaurante,sus tumbonas,sus sombrillas si todo igual PERO!!!! si primer pero,donde estan las habitaciones???.Resulta que lo que se ve en las fotos es el beach club,situado en la mejor y única playa con arena donde poder bañarse,la playa una chulada,pero y las habitaciones??? Vuelvo a insistir...pues estan en el interior de la isla a unos 15 minutos del beach club donde esta la playa y donde esta el restaurante para el desayuno.Pero el problema no es solo la distancia sino que esta junto a las casas donde vive la gente local,nada q decir de ellos,pero para acceder son callejones estrechos donde la limpieza brilla por su ausencia y que por la noche no están iluminados y necesitas una linterna para poder llegar,linterna q ya te proporciona el hotel.Ademas hay q añadir que están junto a la mezquita de la isla y esto es un gran problema ya que al ponerse el sol empiezan sus rezos ,nada que decir,pero con un volumen exageradamente alto y distorsionado muy muy molestoso y el problema se magnifica cuando a las 4:45h de la madrugada al amanecer empiezan de nuevo los rezos con el mismo volumen exagerado y distorsionado que te despiertan y ya no puedes dormir porque duran rato pero mucho rato.Esto sucede tanto en el scallywags smuglers como en el mango retreat,también mal ubicado en el interior isla.
Otra pega es el desayuno,aquí el principal problema es la limpieza,es muy marranote todo además de poco variado.
Como positivo,sus trabajadores todos muy amables y simpáticos y siempre para lo que necesites,un diez por ellos.
En resumen por el precio de este hotel tienes muchos en la isla mejor ubicados y mas tranquilos.
Mi consejo coger un hotel que este situado del puerto hacia el oeste,es la zona mas bonita y limpia,como hotel el Ombak se ve muy muy bien.El único inconveniente de todos es que para bañarte tienes que ir al beach club del scallywags ya que su playa es la mejor,pero es un paseito o también puedes coger una bici o un carro con caballo para que te lleve.Pero tendrás como ventaja el hotel ,su piscina,habitaciones todo junto y mucho mas tranquilo y limpio.
Creo que el hotel tendría que informar de que las habitaciones y el resto del hotel estan en diferentes zonas.
También estuve scallywags trawaguan,el hotel algo mejor pero la isla es una locura y la basura esta por todos lados,ademas de un caos horrible,peligro de q te atropellen los coches de caballos o las bicis,masificado al máximo.
title: No es lo que parece

text: Wir kamen von Gili Trawangan und der Transport vom Scallywage dort war mit dem 9 Uhr Schiff gratis, bis zum Beachclub auf Gili Air. Dort hat man als Hotelgast auch gratis Liegen. Wir wurden dann zu Fuss abgeholt und marschierten durchs Dorf. Dass die drei Zimmer Villa nicht bei den anderen Hotelzimmern ist, hatte ich beim Buchen nicht realisiert. Es sind zwei Villen nebeneinander mitten unter den Einheimischen. Frühstück kann man entweder ins Haus bestellen oder vorne beim Beachclub einnehmen, sicher 10 Minuten zu Fuss entfernt. Das Haus ist gross, wir hatten auch gratis vier Fahrräder. Waren nur eine Nacht, eine mehr wäre toll gewesen. Gili Air hat vorallem Touristen, die schon länger rumreisen.
title: Villa im Dorf

text:
Point positif
Personnel très agréable, très disponible et très pro.
Tout le personnel est souriant et poli.
Entre l hôtel et le restaurant ( petit déjeuner ) il faut marcher 10 min.
Mais le resto est très bien placé en front de mer.
Les transats du restaurant sont gratuits pour les clients de l hôtel.
L hôtel prête des vélos selon disponibilités.

Point négatif
La piscine est pas très grande, mais à gili air, on est mieu ds la mer.

J y retournerai sans hésiter.
title: Vraiment bien

text:
Esta casi al final de la calle principal de la zona del muelle, cocina muy bien elaborada y una situación envidiable pegada al mar.
Pedimos uno de los pescados locales preparados al grill y no nos decepcionaron, nos habían recomendado el lugar y como siempre cuando el río suena agua lleva.
La oferta para comer en esta zona es increíble, durante los tres días que estuvimos en GILI Tranvanjan probamos media docena de restaurantes, en casi todos quedamos satisfechos de la calidad y la preparación, este fue uno de los mejores.
title: Uno de los mejores

text: Vi boede i Scallywags Joglo 1, som er en 3 værelses villa med egen pool. Virkelig lækkert og med masser af plads. Eneste ulempe er at det ligger tæt på en moske og det larmer et par gange om dagen. Der er ca. 10 minutters gang til stranden og Scallywags Beach Club. En hyggelig gåtur. Og ellers kan du tage de cykler som høre med til villaen, som også er gode til at cykle rundt på øen. De ansatte er meget venlige og de holder villaen fint ren hver dag. Kan kun anbefales :-)
title: Super fed villa med pool og masser af plads

text: Отдыхали в этом отеле неделю с 2 маленькими детьми. Очень довольны, что выбрали именно его. На острове сложно найти что то приличное по хорошей цене. Пожалуй, scallywags это лучший вариант по хорошей цене. Номера уютные, чисто, убирают хорошо. На завтрак шведский стол прямо на пляже, еда вкусная. Пляж чистый, оборудован мягкими лежаками. Отливов/приливов на этом пляже не замечается, купаться удобно в течении всего дня. Сервис очень хороший, любую просьбу выполняют моментально и с улыбкой. Мы остались всем довольны, рекомендую этот отель !
title: Цена-качество на отлично!

text: Goede tent heerlijke bbq en accurate bediening op het fraaie gili air. Ik nam de butterfish van de kaart. Die was fantastisch. Maar ook de anderen hadden complimenten. Kwaliteit is goed en de bediening ook. Veel variatie en een goede  keuken . Pff veel woorden voor deze recentie nodig.
title: Heerlijk en goede bediening

text:
Hola
Estuvimos en este hotel en temporada baja(enero)por lo que el
Precio de nuestra habitación estuvo muy bien(teníamos la económica)la 
Bienvenido fue muy calurosa y hasta un cóctel te dan en el restaurante(5 mint caminando)muy muy rico. Recibimos nuestra habitación . Muy limpia , incluido baño y una pequeña entrada con unas sillas,tienes una nevera muy bien equipada con bebidas etc , claro para pagar, gratis tienen dos botellas de agua cada día. La cama con sábanas tan blancas como coco(poco común en Bali) y cómoda ,tienes piscina a dos minutos de la habitación hacia la playa  debes caminar en el mismo lugar donde está el restaurante donde tomas el
Desayuno que no estaba incluido en el precio de nuestra habitación pero fueron 50.000)el desayuno explendido un Buffet con de todo y pides que te hagan a tortilla o un panqu, delicioso,también puedes comer, los precios son Ok. En las noches hace una BBQ muy buena y variada.Para los clientes del hotel tienen sillas y sombrillas gratis.
Después de dos noches en  nuestra habitación presentamos problema, lo informamos en la recepción y en dos minutos estaba con nosotros el Manager del hotel el señor Tedy muy amable enseguida nos ofreció un cambio de habitación,la cual aceptamos qué significaba cambiamos de hotel (ellos tienen tres instalaciones en la isla).este otro local tiene las habitaciones superiores también una piscina y el desayuno está incluido, las bicicletas.la habitación exactamente como se ve en las fotos, más grande que la anterior, el baño afuera de la habitación, todo muy limpio, la cama más amplia,tienes un pequeño jardín acogedor y todo privado.ademas de todas comodidades (nevera, tv, dvd,agua)
El servicio del personal, excelentes Todos!  
Tanto en el restaurante, como los del hotel.Siempre pendiente que no e falte de nada.
Gracias a todos ,saludos al Señor Tedy
Seguro que lo recomendaría ...
title: Buen hotel y muy buen servicio

text:
Wir haben ein Standartzimmer für 6 Nächte gebucht und wurden nach einer schrecklichen Bootsfahrt glücklicherweise von einem netten Mitarbeiter am Hafen abgeholt. Die Unterkunft liegt etwa 3 Gehminuten vom Pier entfernt. Der Weg dorthin war furchtbar, überall liegt Müll herum und es sieht wirklich heruntergekommen aus - der einzige Nachteil an Gili air. Deshalb war es eine Riesen Erleichterung, als uns unser Raum gezeigt wurde, welcher nicht Standart ist sondern absolut super. Die Räume sind allesamt in Privatbereichen, wir hatten eine kleine schöne Überdachte Holzterasse. Das Zimmer ist groß, toll eingerichtet, die Betten sind auch groß, bequem und es gibt viele Ablegeflächen. Das Bad ist Outdoor, was ich erst ein wenig unangenehm fand weil ich mir um Insekten Sorgen machte, aber die wurden mir schnell genommen. Die ganze Unterkunft ist wirklich pingelig sauber. Wird täglich gereinigt, auf Wunsch sogar 2 mal, was wir jetzt nicht nötig fanden. Auch gibt es eine wöchentliche Mosquito-Vorbeugungsmaßnahme was ich persönlich klasse finde, weil man von den Viechern dort echt nichts gemerkt hat. Zudem kann man in der Rezeption kostenlos Fahrräder für den ganzen Aufenthalt leihen, die echt schön sind! Die Sättel sind ein wenig unbequem, aber wen juckts. Der Pool ist übrigens auch sehr gepflegt und schön. Für "Lazy days" kann man sich in der Rezeption kostenlos gute Dvds und Zeitschriften ausleihen. Fand ich klasse. Zum Frühstück muss man allerdings ins Scallywags Beach Club, welches zu Fuß ca 15 min von der Unterkunft entfernt ist. Mit dem Fahrrad war das aber kein Problem. Dort ist das Frühstücksbuffet sehr lecker und man kann sich für den ganzen Tag bequeme liegen mit Sonnenschirm direkt am Strand kostenlos reservieren lassen. Ein weiterer Pluspunkt: nur wenige Minuten von der Unterkunft gibt es diesen strandabschnitt mit einer Mega Wasserschaukel und bequemen Hängematten. 
Das einzige Manko ist das schlechte WLAN, aber das ist eben auf der ganzen Insel so. 

Alles in allem ein super preis leistungsverhältnis und mehr als überzeugend!!
title: Rundum zufrieden :-)

owner_response.text:
Hi anni210298,

Thanks for you extensive review

Scallywags
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Fuimos a este hotel por las buenas críticas y acertamos. Te tratan estupendamente. Nos dejaron ver la habitación antes de reservarla ya que no teníamos hecha la reserva. Cama comodisima y aire acondicionado que funciona de maravilla. Por la noche había algún apagón pero lo solucionaban enseguida. Tenían DVDs gratis para ver en las habitaciones, cosa que agradecimos después de un mes por Indonesia. Habitación muy limpia y bien cuidada. El personal muy amable y atento en todo. Desayuno correcto para Indonesia. Volvería sin dudarlo.
title: Relax en Gili Air

owner_response.text:

Thanks for your lovely review, we look forward to seeing you again soon

Scallywags

text:
